Author: Ruicosta.ac
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: One blockchain to arrange and control everything connected to a business project. An employer can set up the project, find the workers using the platform, arrange all the contracts and objectives and then execute the project and pay the employees. It can ease the proccess and help to organise the projects with workers from all over the world working in their homes. And that's the future we will face when you no longer need to go to work and be there personally and the employer can look for the best qualified people not only in the city of the company but can hire everywhere.

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Hello, dear bitcointalk members!    Quote from: dort on March 13, 2018, 07:23:03 PM Look, If I find a person which I want to work with, will we be able to negotiate within the service or will we have to use the communication channels outside the system? Quote from: rdizza on March 13, 2018, 10:24:43 PM Will there be any authorized person acting as a guarantee that none of the party will make a scam attempt? Quote from: g8stTDas on March 13, 2018, 11:53:06 PM It’s  good that the service will have its moderatos which will solve the disputes, as I got it. But the one thing remaining unclear is who will be the moderators. Quote from: devilini on March 14, 2018, 12:28:57 PM There will be an opportunity to upload your projects in TiesDB. That's understandable. But for what purpose will it be done? Will the creators of the projects benefit somehow from this?  Now we are focused primarily on the decentralized database - Ties.DB, which is the first truly decentralized database in the world. Please take a look at this article: https://medium.com/@TIESNETWORK/from-now-on-we-are-ties-db-9054b529b75d   Quote from: gazman on March 13, 2018, 05:55:03 PM How will the TiesDB users look for potential partners or employers? Will there be  a special search form for this purpose?  I’d like to know what filters will be available in this form. We are open to cooperation. Here you will find our offer: https://medium.com/@TIESNETWORK/ties-db-offer-for-every-blockchain-925aa1d47978   Quote from: polonium84 on March 13, 2018, 08:48:01 PM Will the employers be able to pay for services of other people with tokens only? Don’t developers consider other payment options?  Ties.DB uses TIE tokens to work. All the operations are paid in TIEs, farmers get TIEs for providing their computers to Ties.DB network.   Quote from: sdfslei on March 14, 2018, 08:06:14 AM Has the ICO of this company ended already?  Our TGE ended long ago. Concluded about 6 months ago.  Quote from: sdfslei on March 14, 2018, 08:20:03 AM Quote from: Gamelander on March 14, 2018, 08:14:09 AM Quote from: sdfslei on March 14, 2018, 08:06:14 AM Has the ICO of this company ended already?  Yes, it has happened recently. How many tokens were sold? We distributed 59 251 278,09 tokens, and the rest 141 million have been burned. All tokens belong to public except the ones for team: team share, reserve fund. These tokens are not yet circulating. So the circulating supply is about 40mln TIE tokens.   Quote from: waitsummer on March 14, 2018, 04:30:20 PM Guys, if my project hasn’t created a web site, will I still be able to upload it in TiesDB with the condition that the site will be made soon?  You can configure the database using a browser and an application. But for database queries you need to create dApp. So you don't need site at the start.  Best regards, Ties.DB team.

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Hello, dear BitcoinTalk members!     We don't have our own wallet. TIE is supported itself by any wallets, that support ERC20. Including hardware wallets, that support erc20.  Wallets supporting erc-20 standard: MyEtherWallet, Mist, Parity, Jaxx, imToken, MetaMask etc  Quote from: Mat24 on March 15, 2018, 07:32:02 AM Did TiesDB collect the hard-cap on its ICO?  No, the full hard cap was not collected. Team Ties.DB managed to collect about $9mln.  Quote from: yehor on March 14, 2018, 11:10:08 PM Can I find you on https://github.com???  Sure, you can check this by clicking this link: https://github.com/tiesnetwork  Best regards, Ties.DB team.

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Github January report  January was quite fruitful. We have finished and refined protocol parser and proceeded to protocol implementation. By now write request is almost done. Besides we developed Ties.DB smart contracts that will govern the database and made java library for connecting Ties.DB and a blockchain. Currently we support only Ethereum but we made an abstraction layer to support other blockchains in future as well. We also started GUI for database schema composing. With this GUI you will be able to manage smart contracts that control database schema.  Medium

Author: S3cco
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Bitcoin Garden: Ties DB Offers Enhanced Blockchain Security for Its Data Storage https://bitcoingarden.org/ties-db-offers-enhanced-blockchain-security-data-storage/  The rapid growth of blockchain and crypto economics has led to the development of distributed database management system prototypes and commercial distributed database management systems. Now the computing environment has shifted from the centralized model to a more decentralized one. This shift has been motivated primarily by the increased decentralization of most business operations.  In such systems, the database is stored in several computers which are interconnected by some communication media. As companies distribute data across various platforms, there appears the need to pay more attention to its security and protection of the stored data.  TiesDB is an independent entity and is designed for structured storage of large data sets in a public, decentralized, distributed network. TiesDB database offers a unique infrastructural solution for the burgeoning market of decentralized applications and blockchain-based businesses.  With the new public, decentralized TiesDB platform one can store unlimited data, retrieve files and conduct searches. TiesDB developers realized the potential threats and have selected appropriate techniques to protect data on the new platform....

Body: Cloud-Based Decentralized Storage Partnership Announced: TiesDB and IAGON  A new partnership should make the world’s first public decentralized public blockchain database far easier to access. Database provider TiesDB, has formed a strategic partnership with artificial intelligence (AI) and decentralized applications (DApps) company IAGON.  The partnership will combine TiesDB’s database with IAGON’s cloud-based global supercomputer. IAGON is building a decentralized “global supercomputer” on the blockchain that is powered by artificial intelligence. IAGON’s supercomputer is designed to connect smart devices through the cloud and deliver DApps to them.  Read the details in the article of Coinidol dot com, the world blockchain news outlet: https://coinidol.com/cloud-based-decentralized-storage-partnership-announced/

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Hello everyone, it was a while since we last wrote here.  We are sorry that some of you felt abandoned, but we came through many things since the Token Sale. We went through the loss of a team member, something you perhaps heard of, Parity attack (don't worry, our CTO virtuously dealt with it and kept the money safe), marketing frauds and many other things. However, we are still here, we are working on the project and will go public sometime soon on the Blockchain Conference Kyiv:  https://medium.com/@TIESNETWORK/blockchain-conference-kiyv-3a9a92a5151c. But let's go through everything step by step.  First of all, we never went fully silent, maintaining a constant presence at our Telegram channel: https://t.me/tiesnetwork. Our core team members are answering questions and sharing opinions time to time.  The second thing you may hear of is that Natalia Tokar is no longer with us. Although she is not a key person for the database development, it was a personal and unpleasant story for all of us, since she was more than a colleague, she was a friend. You can read Alexanders comments here: https://www.facebook.com/antifaust/posts/1740860065965572?pnref=story  Third, some of you were worried whether Parity vulnerabilities affected us. Like other projects, we had some hard time with security issues, but things to the quick reaction of Ties CTO, Dmitriy Kochin, all the money are safe and sound.  Last but not least, some of you look discouraged that we switched from the Network to the Database. This was a tough decision to temporarily froze the concept with cherished for so long, however, we did it for a good reason. As you may know, our Token sale is far from its hardcap and, keeping in mind how ambitious our tasks is, we have directed all the funds into the product crypto market craves for - the Database.  The work is going as planned, we are updating our Github and Alpha as to be expected on schedule - Q1-Q2 it is. Our work is mostly technical, and no time spared for media activities. However, we will do our best to keep ourselves public. We see great potential in this solution and naturally, it became a priority for us to deliver what we had promised - a decentralized, distributed database.

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Greetings!  Here is our official position:  1. Do we have a right to extend the token sale? In fact yes, because according to our terms&conditions (that have always been public) we have a right to extend or shorten the period of the token sale. “Ties reserves the right to shorten, extend, postpone or change the timing or duration of the TGE.” 2. Why did we extend the token sale? Because there are VCs and crypto funds that ask us for more time to take a decision and they want to support the Ties.Network Database, which can be the next serious innovation since Oracle. 3. Why didn’t we tell you before? Because we understand that it’s not a good idea to extend the token sale, and we can see it by your comments. We hoped that all funds would have had the time to make their decision. Unfortunately, they ask for more time, so we had to make a decision to give them a chance. 4. Will we refund? Since we didn’t break any rules and acted according to our terms&conditions, there are no precedents for a refund. However, we respect your opinion and we want to do good for the community, and now we are accepting applications for a refund. Please send your applications to this email - support@ties.network. We will review all of them after the token sale is over, i.e. after October 26. Right now it is technically impossible to do a refund, because we can’t touch the funds until the official end of the token sale. 5. Will we extend the token sale again? No, October 26 is the deadline. We can assure you that we will close the sale on October 26 or if we raise the cap (whatever happens earlier). If we break this promise, we will refund everyone, and everyone will get their contribution back. 6. If the token sale is officially open again, it would be a discrimination to restrict some people from contributing. Why some can participate and some not? So we are officially opening it for everyone until Oct 26. 7. What if big whales buy our tokens now? Will it affect the token price? Will they dump them? No, we negotiate only with strategic partners and funds who believe in the product and want to support the development of the database. They are not going to dump the tokens the next day after the token sale. Such are our agreements with them. If we make the project happen, this will result in the growth of TIE token, which is good for everyone. Imagine you’re a serious fund. Would you drop the price of your asset? Probably not, because it will negatively affect your own situation. Big investors suffer more from this than small ones. That is why serious partners on board are a guarantee that the token will get stronger.  With Regards, team Ties.Network

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Greetings!     The cut-off for Ties.Network Token Generation Event funding is $3.000.000. If this is not reached before Token Generation Event end date, all investments will be refunded to the participants.  Quote from: actudoran on October 11, 2017, 07:20:55 PM What do you offer? Tell me more about ties!  Ties.Network is a business platform for the crypto community that allows you to quickly find business partners in crypto communities around the world with proven skills and competencies, and quickly make secure business transactions with the TIE crypto currency that is the basis of the platform. The Ties.Network platform, as well as the Ties.DB (database), work on the TIE token, which is made for the convenience of our users and partners. It allows you to get all the services on one platform, paying them with one cryptocurrency, without the need to purchase and maintain various cryptos. At the same time, our solution is based on Ethereum, and therefore, the user will see in their wallet TIE, ETH and any other Ethereum based tokens that they bought, and will be able to produce any of the cryptos available to other platform users, as well as counterparties outside platform.+  Quote from: spiceminer15 on October 11, 2017, 07:27:25 PM When is it best to purchase and after the purchase how will I benefit  The Ties.Network bonus scale rewards early investors of our Token Generation Event. We offer a range of discounts for early investors of the TIE token. This ranges from a 20% discount for the first 10% of tokens generated to 2% for the last 80-90% of tokens. Author: ianp
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Is it possible to participate in the ICO without the address Ethereums?

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Greetings!     Ties.Network is an Ethereum-based business platform for the crypto community that allows one to quickly find professionals with proven skills worldwide. Users can strike deals utilizing smart contracts. One can create projects and teams, and conduct ICO’s due diligence with the help of an expert community.  Ties.Network is based on the public, decentralized, distributed NoSQL database, Ties.DB, that can be used by other projects. Ties.DB is Byzantine fault tolerant.  Quote from: ianp on October 11, 2017, 08:47:25 PM Is it possible to participate in the ICO without the address Ethereums?  No, because our token is a token issued on Ethereum blockchain, so you need to have an Ethereum address to receive and store your ICO tokens. You can use any Ethereum wallet: Ethereum wallet, Mist, Parity, MyEtherWallet.com, Jaxx or any other wallet where you have access to the wallet private keys. Do not deposit Ethereum to the TGE using the cryptocurrency exchange account!!! You don't own your cryptoexchange ETH address private key, so will not be able to access your TGE tokens!  With Regards, team Ties.Network

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Greetings!     We have created a clear set of instructions for token generation event. This includes the correct site address, our contact details and how to perform the transaction with your wallet: https://goo.gl/QgntEZ  -  TGE instruction for participation https://goo.gl/HnwYDx  - Video instruction  Quote from: qberty on October 11, 2017, 05:32:05 PM What is the exchange rate for a TIE token to BTC and ETH?  We peg our token to US dollar. Before the end of the TGE campaign the cost will be 1 TIE = $0.24 in ETH equivalent, that is TIE token price will be adjusted automatically once in three hours dependent on the Ethereum rate according to https://coinmarketcap.com due to its high volatility. Please note, that there may be some delays in the adjustment process in case the Ethereum network is overloaded. The amount of TIE tokens to issue for the BTC deposits will be calculated according to the current exchange rate of this cryptocurrency in Ethereum. After the campaign is completed and the token is traded on the relevant cryptocurrency exchange, its value will be determined by the market ratio of supply and demand.  Quote from: ahitman on October 11, 2017, 05:42:10 PM What is the guarantee of the long-term work of this project?  The project invested a lot of resources, there is a development strategy, roadmap development, which is already being implemented. 20% of TIE-tokens remain with the team. And one of our goals is the growth of these TIE-tokens.  With Regards, team Ties.Network

Tell me more about ties!     Ties.Network is a business platform for the crypto community that allows you to quickly find business partners in crypto communities around the world with proven skills and competencies, and quickly make secure business transactions with the TIE crypto currency that is the basis of the platform. The Ties.Network platform, as well as the Ties.DB (database), work on the TIE token, which is made for the convenience of our users and partners. It allows you to get all the services on one platform, paying them with one cryptocurrency, without the need to purchase and maintain various cryptos. At the same time, our solution is based on Ethereum, and therefore, the user will see in their wallet TIE, ETH and any other Ethereum based tokens that they bought, and will be able to produce any of the cryptos available to other platform users, as well as counterparties outside platform.+     Quote from: Itcher on October 10, 2017, 12:50:30 PM When is it best to purchase and after the purchase how will I benefit     Greetings! Author: makemebeat
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Have you guys followed SEC regulation by filing the proper paperwork (or are you planning to be non-US?) So far I haven't found a single ICO that has. Also do you feel that China will fully investigate and approve your case before the ICO begins? As mentioned in the first half of my post most ICOs don't really go anywhere which is why they are working towards regulating them.

Author: Abitcoinfuture
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: why are you doing 1 ico for 2 projects?

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Greetings!     No, because our token is a token issued on Ethereum blockchain, so you need to have an Ethereum address to receive and store your ICO tokens. You can use any Ethereum wallet: Ethereum wallet, Mist, Parity, MyEtherWallet.com, Jaxx or any other wallet where you have access to the wallet private keys. Do not deposit Ethereum to the TGE using the cryptocurrency exchange account!!! You don't own your cryptoexchange ETH address private key, so will not be able to access your TGE tokens!  Quote from: makemebeat on October 10, 2017, 02:03:45 PM Have you guys followed SEC regulation by filing the proper paperwork (or are you planning to be non-US?) So far I haven't found a single ICO that has. Also do you feel that China will fully investigate and approve your case before the ICO begins? As mentioned in the first half of my post most ICOs don't really go anywhere which is why they are working towards regulating them.  They didnt ban actually. US requires SEC filing where token falls under definition of security, and China takes time to investigate ICO cases. Both facts can be no way construed as ICO prohibition. We're not required to file with SEC since TIE token is merely utility one (according to famous Howey test). And the contemplated TGE will be non-us. That will be explicitly set forth in the TGE docs.  Quote from: Abitcoinfuture on October 10, 2017, 02:11:32 PM why are you doing 1 ico for 2 projects?  Because Ties.DB is required to build Ties.Network. We'd like to use existing solution for data storage but there were no any. So we are pioneers to bring Ties.DB to decentralized world.  With Regards, team Ties.Network

Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Those who participate will obtain some shares and/or dividends to provid capital for a startup?

Author: kenel
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: What is the pric.e? Are sharp downturns expected?

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Greetings!      Ties.Network will not be doing rebuys.  Quote from: Kracko on October 10, 2017, 02:39:00 PM How will you distribute TIE tokens?   During the TGE, 70% of TIE tokens will be sold, 10% of the tokens will be reserved for the potential marketing costs, as well as for motivation of early users to join Ties.Network, and 20% of the tokens will be allocated among advisers, counterparties, project development partners and the project team.+  Quote from: mika1977 on October 10, 2017, 02:47:56 PM  Those who participate will obtain some shares and/or dividends to provid capital for a startup?   No, this is not an offering of shares or dividends. The ICO is a launch of the Tie, a utility coin for the Ties Network platform. The ICO allows interested parties to purchase the TIE coin at a discounted rate in advance of the full launch of the Ties Network platform, which allows you to search for business partners in crypto community, create projects and make business deals.  A utility coin refers to the fact that TIE is actually used for more than just speculation on the crypto exchanges but has a value that can be used for other purposes in the future such as mutual payments within the platform to business partners, who are also the members, and financing projects created on the platform.  Quote from: kenel on October 10, 2017, 02:55:58 PM What is the pric.e? Are sharp downturns expected?   The price will be 0.24 USD / TIE and actual rate to ETH will be determined immediately before the Token Sale. Token distribution is starting in less than 2 weeks! Visit our website and sign up for our mailing list so that you don't miss it: https://ties.network  After the campaign is completed and the token is traded on the exchange, its value will be determined by the market ratio of supply and demand. The cost of the TIE token in BTC and ETH will vary depending on the market rate of these currencies.  With Regards, team Ties.Network

Before the end of the TGE campaign the cost will be 1 TIE = $0.24 https://ties.network/tge-details There's a neat calculator for that on the dashboard https://dashboard.ties.network    Quote from: strideynet on October 09, 2017, 01:03:22 PM what aabout exchange wallets?I   sent from this exchange - bitfinex..    We noticed before TGE started that Ties.Network TGE don't support exchange wallets, because in that case participant can loss his SNM-values.  The only solution for this problem is to contact with exchange wallet support. They must return it.     Quote from: chaolang on October 09, 2017, 01:10:49 PM What wallets are acceptable?    All  wallets that support erc20 can store. MyEtherWallet is the most used wallet at the moment. https://www.myetherwallet.com/     Quote from: makemebeat on October 09, 2017, 01:19:21 PM How long will ICO last?     Token-sale was started at 12:00 UTC,September more info here: https://ties.network/TGE-details Token-sale will end after 3 weeks or when the last token gets sold.   With Regards, team Ties.Network

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Greetings!        We have created a clear set of instructions for token generation event. This includes the correct site address, our contact details and how to perform the transaction with your wallet: https://goo.gl/QgntEZ  -  TGE instruction for participation https://goo.gl/HnwYDx  - Video instruction     Quote from: Kracko on October 09, 2017, 01:52:47 PM  What is the exchange rate for a TIE token to BTC and ETH?       We peg our token to US dollar. Before the end of the TGE campaign the cost will be 1 TIE = $0.24 in ETH equivalent, that is TIE token price will be adjusted automatically once in three hours dependent on the Ethereum rate according to https://coinmarketcap.com due to its high volatility. Please note, that there may be some delays in the adjustment process in case the Ethereum network is overloaded. The amount of TIE tokens to issue for the BTC deposits will be calculated according to the current exchange rate of this cryptocurrency in Ethereum. After the campaign is completed and the token is traded on the relevant cryptocurrency exchange, its value will be determined by the market ratio of supply and demand.    Quote from: mika1977 on October 09, 2017, 02:01:03 PM What is the guarantee of the long-term work of this project?    The project invested a lot of resources, there is a development strategy, roadmap development, which is already being implemented. 20% of TIE-tokens remain with the team. And one of our goals is the growth of these TIE-tokens.   With Regards, team Ties.Network

Body: explain to me what is Tise.Network? is this another social network?

Author: goodluck0319
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Is it possible to participate in the ICO without the address Ethereums?

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Token-sale is available until October 12, or until the cap will be collected.  Quote from: hometester on October 08, 2017, 07:48:39 PM How much ties has been sold so far?  Check this page: https://ties.network/tge-details.  Quote from: getwork on October 08, 2017, 07:56:14 PM explain to me what is Tise.Network? is this another social network?  Ties.Network is an Ethereum-based business platform for the crypto community that allows one to quickly find professionals with proven skills worldwide. Users can strike deals utilizing smart contracts. One can create projects and teams, and conduct ICO’s due diligence with the help of an expert community.  Ties.Network is based on the public, decentralized, distributed NoSQL database, Ties.DB, that can be used by other projects. Ties.DB is Byzantine fault tolerant.  Quote from: goodluck0319 on October 08, 2017, 08:03:36 PM Is it possible to participate in the ICO without the address Ethereums?  No, because our token is a token issued on Ethereum blockchain, so you need to have an Ethereum address to receive and store your ICO tokens. You can use any Ethereum wallet: Ethereum wallet, Mist, Parity, MyEtherWallet.com, Jaxx or any other wallet where you have access to the wallet private keys. Do not deposit Ethereum to the TGE using the cryptocurrency exchange account!!! You don't own your cryptoexchange ETH address private key, so will not be able to access your TGE tokens!

Author: strideynet
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Have you guys followed SEC regulation by filing the proper paperwork (or are you planning to be non-US?) So far I haven't found a single ICO that has. Also do you feel that China will fully investigate and approve your case before the ICO begins? As mentioned in the first half of my post most ICOs don't really go anywhere which is why they are working towards regulating them.

Author: chaolang
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: why are you doing 1 ico for 2 projects?

Author: makemebeat
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Will Ties team doing rebuys if price could go under ICO prices?

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Greetings!     They didnt ban actually. US requires SEC filing where token falls under definition of security, and China takes time to investigate ICO cases. Both facts can be no way construed as ICO prohibition. We're not required to file with SEC since TIE token is merely utility one (according to famous Howey test). And the contemplated TGE will be non-us. That will be explicitly set forth in the TGE docs.  Quote from: chaolang on October 08, 2017, 08:37:06 PM why are you doing 1 ico for 2 projects?  Because Ties.DB is required to build Ties.Network. We'd like to use existing solution for data storage but there were no any. So we are pioneers to bring Ties.DB to decentralized world.  Quote from: makemebeat on October 08, 2017, 08:49:19 PM Will Ties team doing rebuys if price could go under ICO prices?  Ties.Network will not be doing rebuys.  With Regards, team Ties.Network

Body: Those who participate will obtain some shares and/or dividends to provid capital for a startup?

Author: Kracko
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: What is the pric.e? Are sharp downturns expected?

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Greetings!       During the TGE, 70% of TIE tokens will be sold, 10% of the tokens will be reserved for the potential marketing costs, as well as for motivation of early users to join Ties.Network, and 20% of the tokens will be allocated among advisers, counterparties, project development partners and the project team.+    Quote from: TomKoinify on October 09, 2017, 10:58:34 AM  Those who participate will obtain some shares and/or dividends to provid capital for a startup?       No, this is not an offering of shares or dividends. The ICO is a launch of the Tie, a utility coin for the Ties Network platform. The ICO allows interested parties to purchase the TIE coin at a discounted rate in advance of the full launch of the Ties Network platform, which allows you to search for business partners in crypto community, create projects and make business deals.  A utility coin refers to the fact that TIE is actually used for more than just speculation on the crypto exchanges but has a value that can be used for other purposes in the future such as mutual payments within the platform to business partners, who are also the members, and financing projects created on the platform.      Quote from: Kracko on October 09, 2017, 11:11:27 AM What is the pric.e? Are sharp downturns expected?      The price will be 0.24 USD / TIE and actual rate to ETH will be determined immediately before the Token Sale. Token distribution is starting in less than 2 weeks! Visit our website and sign up for our mailing list so that you don't miss it: https://ties.network  After the campaign is completed and the token is traded on the exchange, its value will be determined by the market ratio of supply and demand. The cost of the TIE token in BTC and ETH will vary depending on the market rate of these currencies.    With Regards, team Ties.Network

This includes the correct site address, our contact details and how to perform the transaction with your wallet: https://goo.gl/QgntEZ  -  TGE instruction for participation https://goo.gl/HnwYDx  - Video instruction  Quote from: TomKoinify on October 08, 2017, 06:31:22 PM When is the close date of this ICO?  Token-sale is available until October 12, or until the cap will be collected.  Quote from: Kracko on October 08, 2017, 06:38:14 PM theres a minimum cap?  The cut-off for Ties.Network Token Generation Event funding is $3.000.000. If this is not reached before Token Generation Event end date, all investments will be refunded to the participants.  Quote from: mika1977 on October 08, 2017, 06:46:57 PM What do you offer? Tell me more about ties!  Ties.Network is a business platform for the crypto community that allows you to quickly find business partners in crypto communities around the world with proven skills and competencies, and quickly make secure business transactions with the TIE crypto currency that is the basis of the platform. The Ties.Network platform, as well as the Ties.DB (database), work on the TIE token, which is made for the convenience of our users and partners. It allows you to get all the services on one platform, paying them with one cryptocurrency, without the need to purchase and maintain various cryptos. At the same time, our solution is based on Ethereum, and therefore, the user will see in their wallet TIE, ETH and any other Ethereum based tokens that they bought, and will be able to produce any of the cryptos available to other platform users, as well as counterparties outside platform.+

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Greetings! The Ties.Network bonus scale rewards early investors of our Token Generation Event. We offer a range of discounts for early investors of the TIE token. This ranges from a 20% discount for the first 10% of tokens generated to 2% for the last 80-90% of tokens. Visit our website: https://ties.network/TGE-details  Quote from: atariguy on October 08, 2017, 07:13:21 PM Token will be available after TGE right ? And will be transferable also then?  Hello!  Token will be available for transfer and trade almost right after the token-sale.  Quote from: Itcher on October 08, 2017, 07:21:02 PM Do you have any ref-links or bounties ? A friend of mine asked me if he can do me a favor. It seems he wants to participate  We have referral system so if you invite your friends with your link (will be available in dashboard) you will get some extra tokens (2% from the tokens they buy). We've updated the stakes counting system. We also introduced new rules for the Token Generation Event. Taking part in this period, you will get more stakes! The rules and conditions can be found here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2092900.msg21945617#msg21945617

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Dear friends, our token sale campaign is still going on.  After it is finished all the unsold tokens will be burned excluding the following stakes:  - The team will receive 20% of not burned TIE tokens. - 7,5% of not burned TIE tokens is a reserve fund for promoting Ties products to the market. - 5 mln TIEs - advisers, bounty and other obligations.  Thus we guarantee that the team will not own the major stake of unsold tokens. We respect our token buyers and will do everything to protect their rights.

Body: The cut-off for Ties.Network Token Generation Event funding is $3.000.000. If this is not reached before Token Generation Event end date, all investments will be refunded to the participants. Quote from: florianuhlemann on October 06, 2017, 08:51:58 PM What do you offer? Tell me more about ties! Ties.Network is a business platform for the crypto community that allows you to quickly find business partners in crypto communities around the world with proven skills and competencies, and quickly make secure business transactions with the TIE crypto currency that is the basis of the platform. The Ties.Network platform, as well as the Ties.DB (database), work on the TIE token, which is made for the convenience of our users and partners. It allows you to get all the services on one platform, paying them with one cryptocurrency, without the need to purchase and maintain various cryptos. At the same time, our solution is based on Ethereum, and therefore, the user will see in their wallet TIE, ETH and any other Ethereum based tokens that they bought, and will be able to produce any of the cryptos available to other platform users, as well as counterparties outside platform.+

Author: VampiricElder
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: I have some questions to ask:  1. Will there be staking/masternodes?  2. What is the minimum amount of Ties you aim to sell ico?  3. Will unsold ties get burnt?

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Greetings!  The cut-off for Ties.Network Token Generation Event funding is $3.000.000. At the moment collected about 6 million. The exact amount of deposit for running Ties.DB node is still to be determined. It should be significant enough to motivate the node to behave well and not too large so it can be affordable for node maintainers. We will calculate the amount during tests later. We are going to burn unsold tokens. We will publish an official news during 1-2 days. Stay tuned!   With regards, team Ties.Network

We offer a range of discounts for early investors of the TIE token. This ranges from a 20% discount for the first 10% of tokens generated to 2% for the last 80-90% of tokens. Visit our website: https://goo.gl/sXfY11  Quote from: Kavallo on October 07, 2017, 01:56:49 PM How long will the contribution period still run?  Token-sale is available until October 12, or until the cap will be collected. More information here: https://ties.network/TGE-details  With Regards, team Ties.Network

Author: TomKoinify
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Have you guys followed SEC regulation by filing the proper paperwork (or are you planning to be non-US?) So far I haven't found a single ICO that has. Also do you feel that China will fully investigate and approve your case before the ICO begins? As mentioned in the first half of my post most ICOs don't really go anywhere which is why they are working towards regulating them.

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Ties.Network is an Ethereum-based business platform for the crypto community that allows one to quickly find professionals with proven skills worldwide. Users can strike deals utilizing smart contracts. One can create projects and teams, and conduct ICO’s due diligence with the help of an expert community.  Ties.Network is based on the public, decentralized, distributed NoSQL database, Ties.DB, that can be used by other projects. Ties.DB is Byzantine fault tolerant.  Quote from: Abitcoinfuture on October 07, 2017, 05:55:23 PM Is it possible to participate in the ICO without the address Ethereums?  No, because our token is a token issued on Ethereum blockchain, so you need to have an Ethereum address to receive and store your ICO tokens. You can use any Ethereum wallet: Ethereum wallet, Mist, Parity, MyEtherWallet.com, Jaxx or any other wallet where you have access to the wallet private keys. Do not deposit Ethereum to the TGE using the cryptocurrency exchange account!!! You don't own your cryptoexchange ETH address private key, so will not be able to access your TGE tokens!  Quote from: TomKoinify on October 07, 2017, 06:05:01 PM Have you guys followed SEC regulation by filing the proper paperwork (or are you planning to be non-US?) So far I haven't found a single ICO that has. Also do you feel that China will fully investigate and approve your case before the ICO begins? As mentioned in the first half of my post most ICOs don't really go anywhere which is why they are working towards regulating them.  They didnt ban actually. US requires SEC filing where token falls under definition of security, and China takes time to investigate ICO cases. Both facts can be no way construed as ICO prohibition. We're not required to file with SEC since TIE token is merely utility one (according to famous Howey test). And the contemplated TGE will be non-us. That will be explicitly set forth in the TGE docs.

Token-sale was started at 12:00 UTC,September more info here: https://ties.network/TGE-details Token-sale will end after 3 weeks or when the last token gets sold.

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: We have created a clear set of instructions for token generation event. This includes the correct site address, our contact details and how to perform the transaction with your wallet: https://goo.gl/QgntEZ  -  TGE instruction for participation https://goo.gl/HnwYDx  - Video instruction Quote from: strideynet on October 06, 2017, 06:47:59 PM What is the exchange rate for a TIE token to BTC and ETH? We peg our token to US dollar. Before the end of the TGE campaign the cost will be 1 TIE = $0.24 in ETH equivalent, that is TIE token price will be adjusted automatically once in three hours dependent on the Ethereum rate according to https://coinmarketcap.com due to its high volatility. Please note, that there may be some delays in the adjustment process in case the Ethereum network is overloaded. The amount of TIE tokens to issue for the BTC deposits will be calculated according to the current exchange rate of this cryptocurrency in Ethereum. After the campaign is completed and the token is traded on the relevant cryptocurrency exchange, its value will be determined by the market ratio of supply and demand.  Quote from: chaolang on October 06, 2017, 06:55:04 PM What is the guarantee of the long-term work of this project? The project invested a lot of resources, there is a development strategy, roadmap development, which is already being implemented. 20% of TIE-tokens remain with the team. And one of our goals is the growth of these TIE-tokens.

Author: strideynet
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: What is the pric.e? Are sharp downturns expected?

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: During the TGE, 70% of TIE tokens will be sold, 10% of the tokens will be reserved for the potential marketing costs, as well as for motivation of early users to join Ties.Network, and 20% of the tokens will be allocated among advisers, counterparties, project development partners and the project team.+     Quote from: goodluck0319 on October 06, 2017, 02:55:56 PM   Those who participate will obtain some shares and/or dividends to provid capital for a startup?      No, this is not an offering of shares or dividends. The ICO is a launch of the Tie, a utility coin for the Ties Network platform. The ICO allows interested parties to purchase the TIE coin at a discounted rate in advance of the full launch of the Ties Network platform, which allows you to search for business partners in crypto community, create projects and make business deals.  A utility coin refers to the fact that TIE is actually used for more than just speculation on the crypto exchanges but has a value that can be used for other purposes in the future such as mutual payments within the platform to business partners, who are also the members, and financing projects created on the platform.       Quote from: strideynet on October 06, 2017, 03:04:46 PM What is the pric.e? Are sharp downturns expected?      The price will be 0.24 USD / TIE and actual rate to ETH will be determined immediately before the Token Sale. Token distribution is starting in less than 2 weeks! Visit our website and sign up for our mailing list so that you don't miss it: https://ties.network  After the campaign is completed and the token is traded on the exchange, its value will be determined by the market ratio of supply and demand. The cost of the TIE token in BTC and ETH will vary depending on the market rate of these currencies.

At the same time, our solution is based on Ethereum, and therefore, the user will see in their wallet TIE, ETH and any other Ethereum based tokens that they bought, and will be able to produce any of the cryptos available to other platform users, as well as counterparties outside platform.+    Quote from: chaolang on October 06, 2017, 01:10:02 PM When is it best to purchase and after the purchase how will I benefit   Greetings! The Ties.Network bonus scale rewards early investors of our Token Generation Event. We offer a range of discounts for early investors of the TIE token. This ranges from a 20% discount for the first 10% of tokens generated to 2% for the last 80-90% of tokens. Visit our website: https://ties.network/TGE-details    Quote from: makemebeat on October 06, 2017, 01:14:55 PM Token will be available after TGE right ? And will be transferable also then?      We have referral system so if you invite your friends with your link (will be available in dashboard) you will get some extra tokens (2% from the tokens they buy). We've updated the stakes counting system. We also introduced new rules for the Token Generation Event. Taking part in this period, you will get more stakes! Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Is it possible to participate in the ICO without the address Ethereums?

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Check this page: https://ties.network/tge-details. Quote from: kenel on October 05, 2017, 07:06:32 PM explain to me what is Tise.Network? is this another social network? Ties.Network is an Ethereum-based business platform for the crypto community that allows one to quickly find professionals with proven skills worldwide. Users can strike deals utilizing smart contracts. One can create projects and teams, and conduct ICO’s due diligence with the help of an expert community.  Ties.Network is based on the public, decentralized, distributed NoSQL database, Ties.DB, that can be used by other projects. Ties.DB is Byzantine fault tolerant. Quote from: atariguy on October 05, 2017, 07:16:06 PM Is it possible to participate in the ICO without the address Ethereums? No, because our token is a token issued on Ethereum blockchain, so you need to have an Ethereum address to receive and store your ICO tokens. You can use any Ethereum wallet: Ethereum wallet, Mist, Parity, MyEtherWallet.com, Jaxx or any other wallet where you have access to the wallet private keys. Do not deposit Ethereum to the TGE using the cryptocurrency exchange account!!! You don't own your cryptoexchange ETH address private key, so will not be able to access your TGE tokens!

Author: Itcher
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Have you guys followed SEC regulation by filing the proper paperwork (or are you planning to be non-US?) So far I haven't found a single ICO that has. Also do you feel that China will fully investigate and approve your case before the ICO begins? As mentioned in the first half of my post most ICOs don't really go anywhere which is why they are working towards regulating them.

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: They didnt ban actually. US requires SEC filing where token falls under definition of security, and China takes time to investigate ICO cases. Both facts can be no way construed as ICO prohibition. We're not required to file with SEC since TIE token is merely utility one (according to famous Howey test). And the contemplated TGE will be non-us. That will be explicitly set forth in the TGE docs. Quote from: florianuhlemann on October 05, 2017, 07:48:13 PM why are you doing 1 ico for 2 projects? Because Ties.DB is required to build Ties.Network. We'd like to use existing solution for data storage but there were no any. So we are pioneers to bring Ties.DB to decentralized world. Quote from: hometester on October 05, 2017, 07:58:32 PM Will Ties team doing rebuys if price could go under ICO prices? Ties.Network will not be doing rebuys. Quote from: getwork on October 05, 2017, 08:07:56 PM How will you distribute TIE tokens? During the TGE, 70% of TIE tokens will be sold, 10% of the tokens will be reserved for the potential marketing costs, as well as for motivation of early users to join Ties.Network, and 20% of the tokens will be allocated among advisers, counterparties, project development partners and the project team.+

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: No, this is not an offering of shares or dividends. The ICO is a launch of the Tie, a utility coin for the Ties Network platform. The ICO allows interested parties to purchase the TIE coin at a discounted rate in advance of the full launch of the Ties Network platform, which allows you to search for business partners in crypto community, create projects and make business deals.  A utility coin refers to the fact that TIE is actually used for more than just speculation on the crypto exchanges but has a value that can be used for other purposes in the future such as mutual payments within the platform to business partners, who are also the members, and financing projects created on the platform.  Quote from: strideynet on October 05, 2017, 08:36:38 PM What is the pric.e? Are sharp downturns expected? The price will be 0.24 USD / TIE and actual rate to ETH will be determined immediately before the Token Sale. Token distribution is starting in less than 2 weeks! Visit our website and sign up for our mailing list so that you don't miss it: https://ties.network  After the campaign is completed and the token is traded on the exchange, its value will be determined by the market ratio of supply and demand. The cost of the TIE token in BTC and ETH will vary depending on the market rate of these currencies.  Quote from: chaolang on October 05, 2017, 08:46:53 PM How long will ICO last? Token-sale is available until October 12, or until the cap will be collected.

Body: We have created a clear set of instructions for token generation event. This includes the correct site address, our contact details and how to perform the transaction with your wallet: https://goo.gl/QgntEZ  -  TGE instruction for participation https://goo.gl/HnwYDx  - Video instruction    Quote from: TomKoinify on October 06, 2017, 11:13:29 AM   What is the exchange rate for a TIE token to BTC and ETH?        We peg our token to US dollar. Before the end of the TGE campaign the cost will be 1 TIE = $0.24 in ETH equivalent, that is TIE token price will be adjusted automatically once in three hours dependent on the Ethereum rate according to https://coinmarketcap.com due to its high volatility. Please note, that there may be some delays in the adjustment process in case the Ethereum network is overloaded. The amount of TIE tokens to issue for the BTC deposits will be calculated according to the current exchange rate of this cryptocurrency in Ethereum. After the campaign is completed and the token is traded on the relevant cryptocurrency exchange, its value will be determined by the market ratio of supply and demand.     Quote from: Kracko on October 06, 2017, 11:22:18 AM What is the guarantee of the long-term work of this project?     The project invested a lot of resources, there is a development strategy, roadmap development, which is already being implemented. 20% of TIE-tokens remain with the team. And one of our goals is the growth of these TIE-tokens.

Visit our website: https://ties.network/TGE-details    Quote from: Itcher on October 05, 2017, 11:05:08 AM Token will be available after TGE right ? And will be transferable also then?    Hello!  Token will be available for transfer and trade almost right after the token-sale.     Quote from: florianuhlemann on October 05, 2017, 11:13:30 AM Do you have any ref-links or bounties ? A friend of mine asked me if he can do me a favor. It seems he wants to participate     We have referral system so if you invite your friends with your link (will be available in dashboard) you will get some extra tokens (2% from the tokens they buy). We've updated the stakes counting system. We also introduced new rules for the Token Generation Event. Taking part in this period, you will get more stakes! The rules and conditions can be found here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2092900.msg21945617#msg21945617

Author: strideynet
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Is it possible to participate in the ICO without the address Ethereums?

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Token-sale is available until October 12, or until the cap will be collected.    Quote from: getwork on October 05, 2017, 11:37:10 AM How much ties has been sold so far?    Check this page: https://ties.network/tge-details.     Quote from: goodluck0319 on October 05, 2017, 11:45:32 AM explain to me what is Tise.Network? is this another social network?    Ties.Network is an Ethereum-based business platform for the crypto community that allows one to quickly find professionals with proven skills worldwide. Users can strike deals utilizing smart contracts. One can create projects and teams, and conduct ICO’s due diligence with the help of an expert community.  Ties.Network is based on the public, decentralized, distributed NoSQL database, Ties.DB, that can be used by other projects. Ties.DB is Byzantine fault tolerant.    Quote from: strideynet on October 05, 2017, 11:53:40 AM Is it possible to participate in the ICO without the address Ethereums?    No, because our token is a token issued on Ethereum blockchain, so you need to have an Ethereum address to receive and store your ICO tokens. You can use any Ethereum wallet: Ethereum wallet, Mist, Parity, MyEtherWallet.com, Jaxx or any other wallet where you have access to the wallet private keys. Do not deposit Ethereum to the TGE using the cryptocurrency exchange account!!! You don't own your cryptoexchange ETH address private key, so will not be able to access your TGE tokens!

Author: chaolang
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Have you guys followed SEC regulation by filing the proper paperwork (or are you planning to be non-US?) So far I haven't found a single ICO that has. Also do you feel that China will fully investigate and approve your case before the ICO begins? As mentioned in the first half of my post most ICOs don't really go anywhere which is why they are working towards regulating them.

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: They didnt ban actually. US requires SEC filing where token falls under definition of security, and China takes time to investigate ICO cases. Both facts can be no way construed as ICO prohibition. We're not required to file with SEC since TIE token is merely utility one (according to famous Howey test). And the contemplated TGE will be non-us. That will be explicitly set forth in the TGE docs.   Quote from: makemebeat on October 05, 2017, 12:23:15 PM why are you doing 1 ico for 2 projects?    Because Ties.DB is required to build Ties.Network. We'd like to use existing solution for data storage but there were no any. So we are pioneers to bring Ties.DB to decentralized world.    Quote from: Abitcoinfuture on October 05, 2017, 12:33:07 PM  How will you distribute TIE tokens?       During the TGE, 70% of TIE tokens will be sold, 10% of the tokens will be reserved for the potential marketing costs, as well as for motivation of early users to join Ties.Network, and 20% of the tokens will be allocated among advisers, counterparties, project development partners and the project team.+

The only solution for this problem is to contact with exchange wallet support. They must return it.      Quote from: kenel on October 04, 2017, 01:34:58 PM What wallets are acceptable?    All  wallets that support erc20 can store. MyEtherWallet is the most used wallet at the moment. https://www.myetherwallet.com/

Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: What is the guarantee of the long-term work of this project?

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: We peg our token to US dollar. Before the end of the TGE campaign the cost will be 1 TIE = $0.24 in ETH equivalent, that is TIE token price will be adjusted automatically once in three hours dependent on the Ethereum rate according to https://coinmarketcap.com due to its high volatility. Please note, that there may be some delays in the adjustment process in case the Ethereum network is overloaded. The amount of TIE tokens to issue for the BTC deposits will be calculated according to the current exchange rate of this cryptocurrency in Ethereum. After the campaign is completed and the token is traded on the relevant cryptocurrency exchange, its value will be determined by the market ratio of supply and demand.  Quote from: getwork on October 04, 2017, 06:51:28 PM What is the guarantee of the long-term work of this project? The project invested a lot of resources, there is a development strategy, roadmap development, which is already being implemented. 20% of TIE-tokens remain with the team. And one of our goals is the growth of these TIE-tokens.

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: No, this is not an offering of shares or dividends. The ICO is a launch of the Tie, a utility coin for the Ties Network platform. The ICO allows interested parties to purchase the TIE coin at a discounted rate in advance of the full launch of the Ties Network platform, which allows you to search for business partners in crypto community, create projects and make business deals.  A utility coin refers to the fact that TIE is actually used for more than just speculation on the crypto exchanges but has a value that can be used for other purposes in the future such as mutual payments within the platform to business partners, who are also the members, and financing projects created on the platform.    Quote from: hometester on October 04, 2017, 11:57:01 AM What is the pric.e? Are sharp downturns expected?     The price will be 0.24 USD / TIE and actual rate to ETH will be determined immediately before the Token Sale. Token distribution is starting in less than 2 weeks! Visit our website and sign up for our mailing list so that you don't miss it: https://ties.network  After the campaign is completed and the token is traded on the exchange, its value will be determined by the market ratio of supply and demand. The cost of the TIE token in BTC and ETH will vary depending on the market rate of these currencies.     Quote from: getwork on October 04, 2017, 12:03:54 PM How long will ICO last?    Token-sale is available until October 12, or until the cap will be collected.    Quote from: goodluck0319 on October 04, 2017, 12:12:51 PM When and what exchanges TIES will be listed?     What exchanges exactly we can tell you after our TGE. We are already communicating with some major cryptoexchanges regarding ours tokens trade. Token will be issued on Ethereum blockchain (ERC20), and it will be available for transfer and trade almost right after the token-sale.

Body: Token-sale is available until October 12, or until the cap will be collected. Quote from: hometester on October 03, 2017, 06:26:16 PM theres a minimum cap? The cut-off for Ties.Network Token Generation Event funding is $3.000.000. If this is not reached before Token Generation Event end date, all investments will be refunded to the participants. Quote from: getwork on October 03, 2017, 06:36:39 PM What do you offer? Tell me more about ties! Ties.Network is a business platform for the crypto community that allows you to quickly find business partners in crypto communities around the world with proven skills and competencies, and quickly make secure business transactions with the TIE crypto currency that is the basis of the platform. The Ties.Network platform, as well as the Ties.DB (database), work on the TIE token, which is made for the convenience of our users and partners. It allows you to get all the services on one platform, paying them with one cryptocurrency, without the need to purchase and maintain various cryptos. At the same time, our solution is based on Ethereum, and therefore, the user will see in their wallet TIE, ETH and any other Ethereum based tokens that they bought, and will be able to produce any of the cryptos available to other platform users, as well as counterparties outside platform.+

Quote from: florianuhlemann on October 03, 2017, 03:52:16 PM What exchange rate do you use?   Before the end of the TGE campaign the cost will be 1 TIE = $0.24 https://ties.network/tge-details There's a neat calculator for that on the dashboard https://dashboard.ties.network     Quote from: hometester on October 03, 2017, 03:59:58 PM what aabout exchange wallets?I   sent from this exchange - bitfinex..    We noticed before TGE started that Ties.Network TGE don't support exchange wallets, because in that case participant can loss his SNM-values.  The only solution for this problem is to contact with exchange wallet support. They must return it.     Quote from: getwork on October 03, 2017, 04:07:43 PM What wallets are acceptable?    All  wallets that support erc20 can store. MyEtherWallet is the most used wallet at the moment. https://www.myetherwallet.com/

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Token-sale was started at 12:00 UTC,September more info here: https://ties.network/TGE-details Token-sale will end after 3 weeks or when the last token gets sold.     Quote from: chaolang on October 03, 2017, 04:38:19 PM How can i buy TIE tokens?    We have created a clear set of instructions for token generation event. This includes the correct site address, our contact details and how to perform the transaction with your wallet: https://goo.gl/QgntEZ  -  TGE instruction for participation https://goo.gl/HnwYDx  - Video instruction    Quote from: makemebeat on October 03, 2017, 04:45:57 PM What is the exchange rate for a TIE token to BTC and ETH?      We peg our token to US dollar. Before the end of the TGE campaign the cost will be 1 TIE = $0.24 in ETH equivalent, that is TIE token price will be adjusted automatically once in three hours dependent on the Ethereum rate according to https://coinmarketcap.com due to its high volatility. Please note, that there may be some delays in the adjustment process in case the Ethereum network is overloaded. The amount of TIE tokens to issue for the BTC deposits will be calculated according to the current exchange rate of this cryptocurrency in Ethereum. After the campaign is completed and the token is traded on the relevant cryptocurrency exchange, its value will be determined by the market ratio of supply and demand.

Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Greetings! The Ties.Network bonus scale rewards early investors of our Token Generation Event. We offer a range of discounts for early investors of the TIE token. This ranges from a 20% discount for the first 10% of tokens generated to 2% for the last 80-90% of tokens. Visit our website: https://ties.network/TGE-details      Quote from: Kracko on October 03, 2017, 12:25:05 PM Token will be available after TGE right ? And will be transferable also then?     Hello!  Token will be available for transfer and trade almost right after the token-sale.     Quote from: mika1977 on October 03, 2017, 12:34:23 PM Do you have any ref-links or bounties ? A friend of mine asked me if he can do me a favor. It seems he wants to participate      We have referral system so if you invite your friends with your link (will be available in dashboard) you will get some extra tokens (2% from the tokens they buy). We've updated the stakes counting system. We also introduced new rules for the Token Generation Event. Taking part in this period, you will get more stakes! The rules and conditions can be found here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2092900.msg21945617#msg21945617

Author: florianuhlemann
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Is it possible to participate in the ICO without the address Ethereums?

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Token-sale is available until October 12, or until the cap will be collected.     Quote from: atariguy on October 03, 2017, 12:58:14 PM How much ties has been sold so far?    Check this page: https://ties.network/tge-details.     Quote from: Itcher on October 03, 2017, 01:06:21 PM explain to me what is Tise.Network? is this another social network?     Ties.Network is an Ethereum-based business platform for the crypto community that allows one to quickly find professionals with proven skills worldwide. Users can strike deals utilizing smart contracts. One can create projects and teams, and conduct ICO’s due diligence with the help of an expert community.  Ties.Network is based on the public, decentralized, distributed NoSQL database, Ties.DB, that can be used by other projects. Ties.DB is Byzantine fault tolerant.      Quote from: florianuhlemann on October 03, 2017, 01:14:16 PM Is it possible to participate in the ICO without the address Ethereums?     No, because our token is a token issued on Ethereum blockchain, so you need to have an Ethereum address to receive and store your ICO tokens. You can use any Ethereum wallet: Ethereum wallet, Mist, Parity, MyEtherWallet.com, Jaxx or any other wallet where you have access to the wallet private keys. Do not deposit Ethereum to the TGE using the cryptocurrency exchange account!!! You don't own your cryptoexchange ETH address private key, so will not be able to access your TGE tokens!

Author: hometester
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Have you guys followed SEC regulation by filing the proper paperwork (or are you planning to be non-US?) So far I haven't found a single ICO that has. Also do you feel that China will fully investigate and approve your case before the ICO begins? As mentioned in the first half of my post most ICOs don't really go anywhere which is why they are working towards regulating them.

Author: mbtc31
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: A basic question that everyone needs to know.  What is Tise.Network? is this another social network?  Ties.Network is an Ethereum-based business platform for the crypto community that allows one to quickly find professionals with proven skills worldwide. Users can strike deals utilizing smart contracts. One can create projects and teams, and conduct ICO’s due diligence with the help of an expert community.  Ties.Network is based on the public, decentralized, distributed NoSQL database, Ties.DB, that can be used by other projects. Ties.DB is Byzantine fault tolerant.

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: They didnt ban actually. US requires SEC filing where token falls under definition of security, and China takes time to investigate ICO cases. Both facts can be no way construed as ICO prohibition. We're not required to file with SEC since TIE token is merely utility one (according to famous Howey test). And the contemplated TGE will be non-us. That will be explicitly set forth in the TGE docs.    Quote from: getwork on October 03, 2017, 01:38:40 PM why are you doing 1 ico for 2 projects?    Because Ties.DB is required to build Ties.Network. We'd like to use existing solution for data storage but there were no any. So we are pioneers to bring Ties.DB to decentralized world.     Quote from: goodluck0319 on October 03, 2017, 01:46:35 PM Will Ties team doing rebuys if price could go under ICO prices?      Ties.Network will not be doing rebuys.     Quote from: strideynet on October 03, 2017, 01:54:26 PM  How will you distribute TIE tokens?        During the TGE, 70% of TIE tokens will be sold, 10% of the tokens will be reserved for the potential marketing costs, as well as for motivation of early users to join Ties.Network, and 20% of the tokens will be allocated among advisers, counterparties, project development partners and the project team.+     Quote from: chaolang on October 03, 2017, 02:01:34 PM  Those who participate will obtain some shares and/or dividends to provid capital for a startup?      No, this is not an offering of shares or dividends. The ICO is a launch of the Tie, a utility coin for the Ties Network platform. The ICO allows interested parties to purchase the TIE coin at a discounted rate in advance of the full launch of the Ties Network platform, which allows you to search for business partners in crypto community, create projects and make business deals.  A utility coin refers to the fact that TIE is actually used for more than just speculation on the crypto exchanges but has a value that can be used for other purposes in the future such as mutual payments within the platform to business partners, who are also the members, and financing projects created on the platform.

Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: There is no minimin purchase.    Quote from: strideynet on October 03, 2017, 11:25:27 AM how to participate in your TGE and get TIE?    We have created a clear set of instructions for token generation event. This includes the correct site address, our contact details and how to perform the transaction with your wallet: https://goo.gl/QgntEZ  -  TGE instruction for participation https://goo.gl/HnwYDx  - Video instruction    Token-sale is available until October 12, or until the cap will be collected.    Quote from: makemebeat on October 03, 2017, 11:49:58 AM theres a minimum cap?    The cut-off for Ties.Network Token Generation Event funding is $3.000.000. If this is not reached before Token Generation Event end date, all investments will be refunded to the participants.     Quote from: Abitcoinfuture on October 03, 2017, 12:00:21 PM What do you offer? Tell me more about ties!      Ties.Network is a business platform for the crypto community that allows you to quickly find business partners in crypto communities around the world with proven skills and competencies, and quickly make secure business transactions with the TIE crypto currency that is the basis of the platform. The Ties.Network platform, as well as the Ties.DB (database), work on the TIE token, which is made for the convenience of our users and partners. It allows you to get all the services on one platform, paying them with one cryptocurrency, without the need to purchase and maintain various cryptos. At the same time, our solution is based on Ethereum, and therefore, the user will see in their wallet TIE, ETH and any other Ethereum based tokens that they bought, and will be able to produce any of the cryptos available to other platform users, as well as counterparties outside platform.+

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Token-sale is available until October 12, or until the cap will be collected. Quote from: kenel on September 30, 2017, 11:12:44 PM theres a minimum cap? The cut-off for Ties.Network Token Generation Event funding is $3.000.000. If this is not reached before Token Generation Event end date, all investments will be refunded to the participants. Quote from: atariguy on September 30, 2017, 11:19:54 PM What do you offer? Tell me more about ties! Ties.Network is a business platform for the crypto community that allows you to quickly find business partners in crypto communities around the world with proven skills and competencies, and quickly make secure business transactions with the TIE crypto currency that is the basis of the platform. The Ties.Network platform, as well as the Ties.DB (database), work on the TIE token, which is made for the convenience of our users and partners. It allows you to get all the services on one platform, paying them with one cryptocurrency, without the need to purchase and maintain various cryptos. At the same time, our solution is based on Ethereum, and therefore, the user will see in their wallet TIE, ETH and any other Ethereum based tokens that they bought, and will be able to produce any of the cryptos available to other platform users, as well as counterparties outside platform.+  Quote from: Itcher on September 30, 2017, 11:30:06 PM When is it best to purchase and after the purchase how will I benefit Greetings! The Ties.Network bonus scale rewards early investors of our Token Generation Event. We offer a range of discounts for early investors of the TIE token. This ranges from a 20% discount for the first 10% of tokens generated to 2% for the last 80-90% of tokens. Visit our website: https://ties.network/TGE-details Quote from: florianuhlemann on September 30, 2017, 11:39:59 PM Token will be available after TGE right ? And will be transferable also then? Hello!  Token will be available for transfer and trade almost right after the token-sale. Quote from: hometester on September 30, 2017, 11:49:58 PM Do you have any ref-links or bounties ? A friend of mine asked me if he can do me a favor. It seems he wants to participate We have referral system so if you invite your friends with your link (will be available in dashboard) you will get some extra tokens (2% from the tokens they buy). We've updated the stakes counting system. We also introduced new rules for the Token Generation Event. Taking part in this period, you will get more stakes! The rules and conditions can be found here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2092900.msg21945617#msg21945617

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Token-sale is available until October 12, or until the cap will be collected.    Quote from: goodluck0319 on October 01, 2017, 11:19:04 AM How much ties has been sold so far?    Check this page: https://ties.network/tge-details.     Quote from: strideynet on October 01, 2017, 11:29:57 AM explain to me what is Tise.Network? is this another social network?     Ties.Network is an Ethereum-based business platform for the crypto community that allows one to quickly find professionals with proven skills worldwide. Users can strike deals utilizing smart contracts. One can create projects and teams, and conduct ICO’s due diligence with the help of an expert community.  Ties.Network is based on the public, decentralized, distributed NoSQL database, Ties.DB, that can be used by other projects. Ties.DB is Byzantine fault tolerant.

Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Supply/Demand. More people want to buy than sell.

Author: makemebeat
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Have you guys followed SEC regulation by filing the proper paperwork (or are you planning to be non-US?) So far I haven't found a single ICO that has. Also do you feel that China will fully investigate and approve your case before the ICO begins? As mentioned in the first half of my post most ICOs don't really go anywhere which is why they are working towards regulating them.

Author: Abitcoinfuture
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: why are you doing 1 ico for 2 projects?

Author: TomKoinify
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Will Ties team doing rebuys if price could go under ICO prices?

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: No, because our token is a token issued on Ethereum blockchain, so you need to have an Ethereum address to receive and store your ICO tokens. You can use any Ethereum wallet: Ethereum wallet, Mist, Parity, MyEtherWallet.com, Jaxx or any other wallet where you have access to the wallet private keys. Do not deposit Ethereum to the TGE using the cryptocurrency exchange account!!! You don't own your cryptoexchange ETH address private key, so will not be able to access your TGE tokens!    Quote from: makemebeat on October 01, 2017, 11:54:03 AM Have you guys followed SEC regulation by filing the proper paperwork (or are you planning to be non-US?) So far I haven't found a single ICO that has. Also do you feel that China will fully investigate and approve your case before the ICO begins? As mentioned in the first half of my post most ICOs don't really go anywhere which is why they are working towards regulating them.    They didnt ban actually. US requires SEC filing where token falls under definition of security, and China takes time to investigate ICO cases. Both facts can be no way construed as ICO prohibition. We're not required to file with SEC since TIE token is merely utility one (according to famous Howey test). And the contemplated TGE will be non-us. That will be explicitly set forth in the TGE docs.   Quote from: Abitcoinfuture on October 01, 2017, 12:02:10 PM why are you doing 1 ico for 2 projects?   Because Ties.DB is required to build Ties.Network. We'd like to use existing solution for data storage but there were no any. So we are pioneers to bring Ties.DB to decentralized world.   Quote from: TomKoinify on October 01, 2017, 12:08:29 PM Will Ties team doing rebuys if price could go under ICO prices?    Ties.Network will not be doing rebuys.

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Token-sale is available until October 12, or until the cap will be collected.  Quote from: strideynet on September 30, 2017, 07:10:35 PM When and what exchanges TIES will be listed? What exchanges exactly we can tell you after our TGE. We are already communicating with some major cryptoexchanges regarding ours tokens trade. Token will be issued on Ethereum blockchain (ERC20), and it will be available for transfer and trade almost right after the token-sale.  Quote from: chaolang on September 30, 2017, 07:20:25 PM When will tokens be distributed? Token will be issued on Ethereum blockchain (ERC20), and it will be available for transfer and trade almost right after the token-sale. Body: What is the exchange rate for a TIE token to BTC and ETH?

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: We have created a clear set of instructions for token generation event. This includes the correct site address, our contact details and how to perform the transaction with your wallet: https://goo.gl/QgntEZ  -  TGE instruction for participation https://goo.gl/HnwYDx  - Video instruction Quote from: getwork on September 30, 2017, 09:25:15 PM What is the exchange rate for a TIE token to BTC and ETH? We peg our token to US dollar. Before the end of the TGE campaign the cost will be 1 TIE = $0.24 in ETH equivalent, that is TIE token price will be adjusted automatically once in three hours dependent on the Ethereum rate according to https://coinmarketcap.com due to its high volatility. Please note, that there may be some delays in the adjustment process in case the Ethereum network is overloaded. The amount of TIE tokens to issue for the BTC deposits will be calculated according to the current exchange rate of this cryptocurrency in Ethereum. After the campaign is completed and the token is traded on the relevant cryptocurrency exchange, its value will be determined by the market ratio of supply and demand.
