Author: hometester
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Those who participate will obtain some shares and/or dividends to provid capital for a startup?

Author: getwork
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: What is the pric.e? Are sharp downturns expected?

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: During the TGE, 70% of TIE tokens will be sold, 10% of the tokens will be reserved for the potential marketing costs, as well as for motivation of early users to join Ties.Network, and 20% of the tokens will be allocated among advisers, counterparties, project development partners and the project team.+  Quote from: hometester on September 30, 2017, 06:25:43 PM Those who participate will obtain some shares and/or dividends to provid capital for a startup?  No, this is not an offering of shares or dividends. The ICO is a launch of the Tie, a utility coin for the Ties Network platform. The ICO allows interested parties to purchase the TIE coin at a discounted rate in advance of the full launch of the Ties Network platform, which allows you to search for business partners in crypto community, create projects and make business deals.  A utility coin refers to the fact that TIE is actually used for more than just speculation on the crypto exchanges but has a value that can be used for other purposes in the future such as mutual payments within the platform to business partners, who are also the members, and financing projects created on the platform.  Quote from: getwork on September 30, 2017, 06:38:18 PM What is the pric.e? Are sharp downturns expected? The price will be 0.24 USD / TIE and actual rate to ETH will be determined immediately before the Token Sale. Token distribution is starting in less than 2 weeks! Visit our website and sign up for our mailing list so that you don't miss it: https://ties.network  After the campaign is completed and the token is traded on the exchange, its value will be determined by the market ratio of supply and demand. The cost of the TIE token in BTC and ETH will vary depending on the market rate of these currencies.

Author: qberty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Have you guys followed SEC regulation by filing the proper paperwork (or are you planning to be non-US?) So far I haven't found a single ICO that has. Also do you feel that China will fully investigate and approve your case before the ICO begins? As mentioned in the first half of my post most ICOs don't really go anywhere which is why they are working towards regulating them.

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Ties.Network is an Ethereum-based business platform for the crypto community that allows one to quickly find professionals with proven skills worldwide. Users can strike deals utilizing smart contracts. One can create projects and teams, and conduct ICO’s due diligence with the help of an expert community.  Ties.Network is based on the public, decentralized, distributed NoSQL database, Ties.DB, that can be used by other projects. Ties.DB is Byzantine fault tolerant. Quote from: CryptoPromotions on September 26, 2017, 11:14:50 PM Is it possible to participate in the ICO without the address Ethereums? No, because our token is a token issued on Ethereum blockchain, so you need to have an Ethereum address to receive and store your ICO tokens. You can use any Ethereum wallet: Ethereum wallet, Mist, Parity, MyEtherWallet.com, Jaxx or any other wallet where you have access to the wallet private keys. Do not deposit Ethereum to the TGE using the cryptocurrency exchange account!!! You don't own your cryptoexchange ETH address private key, so will not be able to access your TGE tokens!  Quote from: qberty on September 26, 2017, 11:24:15 PM Have you guys followed SEC regulation by filing the proper paperwork (or are you planning to be non-US?) So far I haven't found a single ICO that has. Also do you feel that China will fully investigate and approve your case before the ICO begins? As mentioned in the first half of my post most ICOs don't really go anywhere which is why they are working towards regulating them. "They didnt ban actually. US requires SEC filing where token falls under definition of security, and China takes time to investigate ICO cases. Both facts can be no way construed as ICO prohibition. We're not required to file with SEC since TIE token is merely utility one (according to famous Howey test). And the contemplated TGE will be non-us. That will be explicitly set forth in the TGE docs."

Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: 70% of TIE tokens are being sold during the TGE. And the remaining 30% for the team, marketing and advisors. There will be no buybacks. How will Ties.Network reward Ties.DB node operators?

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Greetings!  The exact amount of deposit for running ties.db node is still to be determined. It should be significant enough to motivate the node to behave well and not too large so it can be affordable for node maintainers. We will calculate the amount during tests later. Let's make simple calculation. The hosting of capable enough node costs about 500$/month, so it should earn 750$/month. Deposit should be at least 6 months of earnings (at the beginning). So 1500$ is the minimum of deposit. If you buy TIES for this sum you will probably be able to run a node. Especially when TIE will go up.  With regards, team Ties.Network

We peg our token to US dollar. Before the end of the TGE campaign the cost will be 1 TIE = $0.24 in ETH equivalent, that is TIE token price will be adjusted automatically once in three hours dependent on the Ethereum rate according to https://coinmarketcap.com due to its high volatility. Please note, that there may be some delays in the adjustment process in case the Ethereum network is overloaded. The amount of TIE tokens to issue for the BTC deposits will be calculated according to the current exchange rate of this cryptocurrency in Ethereum. After the campaign is completed and the token is traded on the relevant cryptocurrency exchange, its value will be determined by the market ratio of supply and demand.  Quote from: spiceminer15 on September 26, 2017, 07:30:32 PM What is the guarantee of the long-term work of this project? Quote from: dermo on September 25, 2017, 09:04:44 PM Is it possible to participate in the ICO without the address Ethereums? No, because our token is a token issued on Ethereum blockchain, so you need to have an Ethereum address to receive and store your ICO tokens. You can use any Ethereum wallet: Ethereum wallet, Mist, Parity, MyEtherWallet.com, Jaxx or any other wallet where you have access to the wallet private keys. Do not deposit Ethereum to the TGE using the cryptocurrency exchange account!!! You don't own your cryptoexchange ETH address private key, so will not be able to access your TGE tokens!  Quote from: BazkieBumpercar on September 25, 2017, 09:15:20 PM Have you guys followed SEC regulation by filing the proper paperwork (or are you planning to be non-US?) So far I haven't found a single ICO that has. Also do you feel that China will fully investigate and approve your case before the ICO begins? As mentioned in the first half of my post most ICOs don't really go anywhere which is why they are working towards regulating them. They didnt ban actually. US requires SEC filing where token falls under definition of security, and China takes time to investigate ICO cases. Both facts can be no way construed as ICO prohibition. We're not required to file with SEC since TIE token is merely utility one (according to famous Howey test). And the contemplated TGE will be non-us. That will be explicitly set forth in the TGE docs.

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Because Ties.DB is required to build Ties.Network. We'd like to use existing solution for data storage but there were no any. So we are pioneers to bring Ties.DB to decentralized world. Quote from: DeeSome on September 25, 2017, 09:45:03 PM Will Ties team doing rebuys if price could go under ICO prices? Ties.Network will not be doing rebuys. Quote from: dcl595 on September 25, 2017, 09:54:16 PM How will you distribute TIE tokens? During the TGE, 70% of TIE tokens will be sold, 10% of the tokens will be reserved for the potential marketing costs, as well as for motivation of early users to join Ties.Network, and 20% of the tokens will be allocated among advisers, counterparties, project development partners and the project team.+  Quote from: code on September 25, 2017, 10:04:29 PM Those who participate will obtain some shares and/or dividends to provid capital for a startup?  No, this is not an offering of shares or dividends. The ICO is a launch of the Tie, a utility coin for the Ties Network platform. The ICO allows interested parties to purchase the TIE coin at a discounted rate in advance of the full launch of the Ties Network platform, which allows you to search for business partners in crypto community, create projects and make business deals.  A utility coin refers to the fact that TIE is actually used for more than just speculation on the crypto exchanges but has a value that can be used for other purposes in the future such as mutual payments within the platform to business partners, who are also the members, and financing projects created on the platform.

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Token-sale was started at 12:00 UTC,September more info here: https://ties.network/TGE-details Token-sale will end after 3 weeks or when the last token gets sold.  Quote from: qberty on September 25, 2017, 04:39:13 PM How can i buy TIE tokens?   We have created a clear set of instructions for token generation event. This includes the correct site address, our contact details and how to perform the transaction with your wallet: https://goo.gl/QgntEZ  -  TGE instruction for participation https://goo.gl/HnwYDx  - Video instruction  Quote from: ahitman on September 25, 2017, 04:50:31 PM What is the exchange rate for a TIE token to BTC and ETH?     We peg our token to US dollar. Before the end of the TGE campaign the cost will be 1 TIE = $0.24 in ETH equivalent, that is TIE token price will be adjusted automatically once in three hours dependent on the Ethereum rate according to https://coinmarketcap.com due to its high volatility. Please note, that there may be some delays in the adjustment process in case the Ethereum network is overloaded. The amount of TIE tokens to issue for the BTC deposits will be calculated according to the current exchange rate of this cryptocurrency in Ethereum. After the campaign is completed and the token is traded on the relevant cryptocurrency exchange, its value will be determined by the market ratio of supply and demand.

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Check this page: https://ties.network/tge-details.  Quote from: dcl595 on September 25, 2017, 11:45:13 AM explain to me what is Tise.Network? is this another social network?   Ties.Network is an Ethereum-based business platform for the crypto community that allows one to quickly find professionals with proven skills worldwide. Users can strike deals utilizing smart contracts. One can create projects and teams, and conduct ICO’s due diligence with the help of an expert community.  Ties.Network is based on the public, decentralized, distributed NoSQL database, Ties.DB, that can be used by other projects. Ties.DB is Byzantine fault tolerant.   Quote from: code on September 25, 2017, 11:55:03 AM Is it possible to participate in the ICO without the address Ethereums?   No, because our token is a token issued on Ethereum blockchain, so you need to have an Ethereum address to receive and store your ICO tokens. You can use any Ethereum wallet: Ethereum wallet, Mist, Parity, MyEtherWallet.com, Jaxx or any other wallet where you have access to the wallet private keys. Do not deposit Ethereum to the TGE using the cryptocurrency exchange account!!! You don't own your cryptoexchange ETH address private key, so will not be able to access your TGE tokens!

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: The cut-off for Ties.Network Token Generation Event funding is $3.000.000. If this is not reached before Token Generation Event end date, all investments will be refunded to the participants. Quote from: thisisnotmyltcusername on September 24, 2017, 11:47:22 PM What do you offer? Tell me more about ties! Ties.Network is a business platform for the crypto community that allows you to quickly find business partners in crypto communities around the world with proven skills and competencies, and quickly make secure business transactions with the TIE crypto currency that is the basis of the platform. The Ties.Network platform, as well as the Ties.DB (database), work on the TIE token, which is made for the convenience of our users and partners. It allows you to get all the services on one platform, paying them with one cryptocurrency, without the need to purchase and maintain various cryptos. At the same time, our solution is based on Ethereum, and therefore, the user will see in their wallet TIE, ETH and any other Ethereum based tokens that they bought, and will be able to produce any of the cryptos available to other platform users, as well as counterparties outside platform.+  Quote from: ianp on September 24, 2017, 11:56:27 PM When is it best to purchase and after the purchase how will I benefit Greetings! The Ties.Network bonus scale rewards early investors of our Token Generation Event. We offer a range of discounts for early investors of the TIE token. This ranges from a 20% discount for the first 10% of tokens generated to 2% for the last 80-90% of tokens. Visit our website: https://ties.network/TGE-details Quote from: dermo on September 25, 2017, 12:06:24 AM Token will be available after TGE right ? And will be transferable also then? Hello!  Token will be available for transfer and trade almost right after the token-sale. Quote from: julerz12 on September 25, 2017, 12:09:54 AM Raised $4,969,237.43 already, selling 24,363,941.46 TIEs Still has 17 days to go. I'm pretty sure this will be a successful ICO.  BTW, just in case there will be unsold tokens, what will the team do with them, will they be burned? They will be frozen and sold over time. Quote from: BazkieBumpercar on September 25, 2017, 12:17:46 AM Do you have any ref-links or bounties ? A friend of mine asked me if he can do me a favor. It seems he wants to participate We have referral system so if you invite your friends with your link (will be available in dashboard) you will get some extra tokens (2% from the tokens they buy). We've updated the stakes counting system. We also introduced new rules for the Token Generation Event. Taking part in this period, you will get more stakes! The rules and conditions can be found here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2092900.msg21945617#msg21945617

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: We noticed before TGE started that Ties.Network TGE don't support exchange wallets, because in that case participant can loss his SNM-values.  The only solution for this problem is to contact with exchange wallet support. They must return it.  Quote from: thisisnotmyltcusername on September 24, 2017, 08:31:07 PM What wallets are acceptable? All  wallets that support erc20 can store. MyEtherWallet is the most used wallet at the moment. https://www.myetherwallet.com/  Quote from: ianp on September 24, 2017, 08:40:33 PM How long will ICO last? Token-sale was started at 12:00 UTC,September more info here: https://ties.network/TGE-details Token-sale will end after 3 weeks or when the last token gets sold.

Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: We have created a clear set of instructions for token generation event. This includes the correct site address, our contact details and how to perform the transaction with your wallet: https://goo.gl/QgntEZ  -  TGE instruction for participation https://goo.gl/HnwYDx  - Video instruction Quote from: granathus on September 24, 2017, 09:24:54 PM What is the exchange rate for a TIE token to BTC and ETH? We peg our token to US dollar. Before the end of the TGE campaign the cost will be 1 TIE = $0.24 in ETH equivalent, that is TIE token price will be adjusted automatically once in three hours dependent on the Ethereum rate according to https://coinmarketcap.com due to its high volatility. Please note, that there may be some delays in the adjustment process in case the Ethereum network is overloaded. The amount of TIE tokens to issue for the BTC deposits will be calculated according to the current exchange rate of this cryptocurrency in Ethereum. After the campaign is completed and the token is traded on the relevant cryptocurrency exchange, its value will be determined by the market ratio of supply and demand.  Quote from: DeeSome on September 24, 2017, 09:37:25 PM What is the guarantee of the long-term work of this project? The project invested a lot of resources, there is a development strategy, roadmap development, which is already being implemented. 20% of TIE-tokens remain with the team. And one of our goals is the growth of these TIE-tokens.

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Ties.Network is a business platform for the crypto community that allows you to quickly find business partners in crypto communities around the world with proven skills and competencies, and quickly make secure business transactions with the TIE crypto currency that is the basis of the platform. The Ties.Network platform, as well as the Ties.DB (database), work on the TIE token, which is made for the convenience of our users and partners. It allows you to get all the services on one platform, paying them with one cryptocurrency, without the need to purchase and maintain various cryptos. At the same time, our solution is based on Ethereum, and therefore, the user will see in their wallet TIE, ETH and any other Ethereum based tokens that they bought, and will be able to produce any of the cryptos available to other platform users, as well as counterparties outside platform.+    Quote from: dcl595 on September 24, 2017, 01:46:41 PM When is it best to purchase and after the purchase how will I benefit   Greetings! The Ties.Network bonus scale rewards early investors of our Token Generation Event. We offer a range of discounts for early investors of the TIE token. This ranges from a 20% discount for the first 10% of tokens generated to 2% for the last 80-90% of tokens. Visit our website: https://ties.network/TGE-details   Quote from: code on September 24, 2017, 01:58:11 PM Token will be available after TGE right ? And will be transferable also then?   Hello!  Token will be available for transfer and trade almost right after the token-sale.   Quote from: actudoran on September 24, 2017, 02:06:41 PM Do you have any ref-links or bounties ? A friend of mine asked me if he can do me a favor. It seems he wants to participate  We have referral system so if you invite your friends with your link (will be available in dashboard) you will get some extra tokens (2% from the tokens they buy). We've updated the stakes counting system. We also introduced new rules for the Token Generation Event. Taking part in this period, you will get more stakes! The rules and conditions can be found here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2092900.msg21945617#msg21945617

Author: ahitman
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Have you guys followed SEC regulation by filing the proper paperwork (or are you planning to be non-US?) So far I haven't found a single ICO that has. Also do you feel that China will fully investigate and approve your case before the ICO begins? As mentioned in the first half of my post most ICOs don't really go anywhere which is why they are working towards regulating them.

Author: thisisnotmyltcusername
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: why are you doing 1 ico for 2 projects?

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Ties.Network is an Ethereum-based business platform for the crypto community that allows one to quickly find professionals with proven skills worldwide. Users can strike deals utilizing smart contracts. One can create projects and teams, and conduct ICO’s due diligence with the help of an expert community.  Ties.Network is based on the public, decentralized, distributed NoSQL database, Ties.DB, that can be used by other projects. Ties.DB is Byzantine fault tolerant.   Quote from: qberty on September 24, 2017, 03:29:17 PM Is it possible to participate in the ICO without the address Ethereums?   No, because our token is a token issued on Ethereum blockchain, so you need to have an Ethereum address to receive and store your ICO tokens. You can use any Ethereum wallet: Ethereum wallet, Mist, Parity, MyEtherWallet.com, Jaxx or any other wallet where you have access to the wallet private keys. Do not deposit Ethereum to the TGE using the cryptocurrency exchange account!!! You don't own your cryptoexchange ETH address private key, so will not be able to access your TGE tokens!   Quote from: ahitman on September 24, 2017, 03:43:05 PM Have you guys followed SEC regulation by filing the proper paperwork (or are you planning to be non-US?) So far I haven't found a single ICO that has. Also do you feel that China will fully investigate and approve your case before the ICO begins? As mentioned in the first half of my post most ICOs don't really go anywhere which is why they are working towards regulating them.  They didnt ban actually. US requires SEC filing where token falls under definition of security, and China takes time to investigate ICO cases. Both facts can be no way construed as ICO prohibition. We're not required to file with SEC since TIE token is merely utility one (according to famous Howey test). And the contemplated TGE will be non-us. That will be explicitly set forth in the TGE docs.   Quote from: thisisnotmyltcusername on September 24, 2017, 03:50:39 PM why are you doing 1 ico for 2 projects?   Because Ties.DB is required to build Ties.Network. We'd like to use existing solution for data storage but there were no any. So we are pioneers to bring Ties.DB to decentralized world.

Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE

Author: BazkieBumpercar
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Those who participate will obtain some shares and/or dividends to provid capital for a startup?

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Ties.Network will not be doing rebuys.   Quote from: dermo on September 24, 2017, 04:27:23 PM How will you distribute TIE tokens?     During the TGE, 70% of TIE tokens will be sold, 10% of the tokens will be reserved for the potential marketing costs, as well as for motivation of early users to join Ties.Network, and 20% of the tokens will be allocated among advisers, counterparties, project development partners and the project team.+   Quote from: BazkieBumpercar on September 24, 2017, 04:38:48 PM Those who participate will obtain some shares and/or dividends to provid capital for a startup?    No, this is not an offering of shares or dividends. The ICO is a launch of the Tie, a utility coin for the Ties Network platform. The ICO allows interested parties to purchase the TIE coin at a discounted rate in advance of the full launch of the Ties Network platform, which allows you to search for business partners in crypto community, create projects and make business deals.  A utility coin refers to the fact that TIE is actually used for more than just speculation on the crypto exchanges but has a value that can be used for other purposes in the future such as mutual payments within the platform to business partners, who are also the members, and financing projects created on the platform.

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: The price will be 0.24 USD / TIE and actual rate to ETH will be determined immediately before the Token Sale. Token distribution is starting in less than 2 weeks! Visit our website and sign up for our mailing list so that you don't miss it: https://ties.network  After the campaign is completed and the token is traded on the exchange, its value will be determined by the market ratio of supply and demand. The cost of the TIE token in BTC and ETH will vary depending on the market rate of these currencies.   Quote from: DeeSome on September 24, 2017, 05:08:41 PM How long will ICO last?  Token-sale is available until October 12, or until the cap will be collected.

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: During the TGE, 70% of TIE tokens will be sold, 10% of the tokens will be reserved for the potential marketing costs, as well as for motivation of early users to join Ties.Network, and 20% of the tokens will be allocated among advisers, counterparties, project development partners and the project team.+   Quote from: actudoran on September 23, 2017, 01:11:08 PM  Those who participate will obtain some shares and/or dividends to provid capital for a startup?    No, this is not an offering of shares or dividends. The ICO is a launch of the Tie, a utility coin for the Ties Network platform. The ICO allows interested parties to purchase the TIE coin at a discounted rate in advance of the full launch of the Ties Network platform, which allows you to search for business partners in crypto community, create projects and make business deals.  A utility coin refers to the fact that TIE is actually used for more than just speculation on the crypto exchanges but has a value that can be used for other purposes in the future such as mutual payments within the platform to business partners, who are also the members, and financing projects created on the platform.  Quote from: spiceminer15 on September 23, 2017, 01:21:56 PM What is the pric.e? Are sharp downturns expected?   The price will be 0.24 USD / TIE and actual rate to ETH will be determined immediately before the Token Sale. Token distribution is starting in less than 2 weeks! Visit our website and sign up for our mailing list so that you don't miss it: https://ties.network  After the campaign is completed and the token is traded on the exchange, its value will be determined by the market ratio of supply and demand. The cost of the TIE token in BTC and ETH will vary depending on the market rate of these currencies.   Quote from: nenelsparadise on September 23, 2017, 01:32:12 PM How long will ICO last?  Token-sale is available until October 12, or until the cap will be collected.

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Ties.Network is a business platform for the crypto community that allows you to quickly find business partners in crypto communities around the world with proven skills and competencies, and quickly make secure business transactions with the TIE crypto currency that is the basis of the platform. The Ties.Network platform, as well as the Ties.DB (database), work on the TIE token, which is made for the convenience of our users and partners. It allows you to get all the services on one platform, paying them with one cryptocurrency, without the need to purchase and maintain various cryptos. At the same time, our solution is based on Ethereum, and therefore, the user will see in their wallet TIE, ETH and any other Ethereum based tokens that they bought, and will be able to produce any of the cryptos available to other platform users, as well as counterparties outside platform.+  Quote from: hometester on September 22, 2017, 11:43:39 PM When is it best to purchase and after the purchase how will I benefit Greetings! The Ties.Network bonus scale rewards early investors of our Token Generation Event. We offer a range of discounts for early investors of the TIE token. This ranges from a 20% discount for the first 10% of tokens generated to 2% for the last 80-90% of tokens. Visit our website: https://ties.network/TGE-details Quote from: getwork on September 22, 2017, 11:51:54 PM Token will be available after TGE right ? And will be transferable also then? Hello!  Token will be available for transfer and trade almost right after the token-sale.

Author: goodluck0319
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Hey what difference between ties.Network and Ties.DB? chinese can buy your token?

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Greetings!  We have two projects. First of them is business network - with integrated deals on smart contracts and reputation system based on deals. With this platform you can quickly find a skilled professional and strike a deal at once and pay with cryptocurrency. The second - is Ties.DB. It is a completely decentralized database with ability to store structured data and search through it. Ties.DB is aimed at all the decentralized projects, not only Ties.Network.  Citizens of any country other than US citizens can buy our tokens. And, in spite of the fact that our token is intended for use inside the Ties.Network platform, we decided to recommend that American citizens should refuse participation in the crowdinvesting campaign of our platform. We respect the laws of all countries of the world and the laws of the USA in particular.In order to avoid disagreements with the American regulator, we do not recommend American citizens to buy our tokens. This provision will be officially fixed in the offer of our service and, in addition, the promo page of our platform (including the private office) for the period of the TGE campaign will not be available for IP addresses from the territory of the United States. These restrictions do not apply to the use of the Ties Network platform itself, which will be available to citizens of all countries from the moment of the readiness of its prototype. At the same time, we will not start the crowdsale campaign until the prototype is fully ready. Citizens of any other state can freely buy TIE coins for mutual settlements within the platform and to support our TGE campaign.  With regards, team Ties.Network

The rules and conditions can be found here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2092900.msg21945617#msg21945617  Quote from: thisisnotmyltcusername on September 23, 2017, 11:28:07 AM When is the close date of this ICO?  Token-sale is available until October 12, or until the cap will be collected.  Quote from: ianp on September 23, 2017, 11:38:02 AM How much ties has been sold so far?  Check this page: https://ties.network/tge-details.   Quote from: dermo on September 23, 2017, 11:49:46 AM explain to me what is Tise.Network? is this another social network?   Ties.Network is an Ethereum-based business platform for the crypto community that allows one to quickly find professionals with proven skills worldwide. Users can strike deals utilizing smart contracts. One can create projects and teams, and conduct ICO’s due diligence with the help of an expert community.  Ties.Network is based on the public, decentralized, distributed NoSQL database, Ties.DB, that can be used by other projects. Ties.DB is Byzantine fault tolerant.

Also do you feel that China will fully investigate and approve your case before the ICO begins? As mentioned in the first half of my post most ICOs don't really go anywhere which is why they are working towards regulating them.

Author: DeeSome
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE

Author: dcl595
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Will Ties team doing rebuys if price could go under ICO prices?

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: No, because our token is a token issued on Ethereum blockchain, so you need to have an Ethereum address to receive and store your ICO tokens. You can use any Ethereum wallet: Ethereum wallet, Mist, Parity, MyEtherWallet.com, Jaxx or any other wallet where you have access to the wallet private keys. Do not deposit Ethereum to the TGE using the cryptocurrency exchange account!!! You don't own your cryptoexchange ETH address private key, so will not be able to access your TGE tokens!   Quote from: granathus on September 23, 2017, 12:20:07 PM Have you guys followed SEC regulation by filing the proper paperwork (or are you planning to be non-US?) So far I haven't found a single ICO that has. Also do you feel that China will fully investigate and approve your case before the ICO begins? As mentioned in the first half of my post most ICOs don't really go anywhere which is why they are working towards regulating them.  They didnt ban actually. US requires SEC filing where token falls under definition of security, and China takes time to investigate ICO cases. Both facts can be no way construed as ICO prohibition. We're not required to file with SEC since TIE token is merely utility one (according to famous Howey test). And the contemplated TGE will be non-us. That will be explicitly set forth in the TGE docs.   Quote from: DeeSome on September 23, 2017, 12:30:48 PM why are you doing 1 ico for 2 projects?    Because Ties.DB is required to build Ties.Network. We'd like to use existing solution for data storage but there were no any. So we are pioneers to bring Ties.DB to decentralized world.   Quote from: dcl595 on September 23, 2017, 12:47:03 PM Will Ties team doing rebuys if price could go under ICO prices?    Ties.Network will not be doing rebuys.

Body: We have created a clear set of instructions for token generation event. This includes the correct site address, our contact details and how to perform the transaction with your wallet: https://goo.gl/QgntEZ  -  TGE instruction for participation https://goo.gl/HnwYDx  - Video instruction  Quote from: chaolang on September 22, 2017, 02:06:33 PM What is the exchange rate for a TIE token to BTC and ETH?    We peg our token to US dollar. Before the end of the TGE campaign the cost will be 1 TIE = $0.24 in ETH equivalent, that is TIE token price will be adjusted automatically once in three hours dependent on the Ethereum rate according to https://coinmarketcap.com due to its high volatility. Please note, that there may be some delays in the adjustment process in case the Ethereum network is overloaded. The amount of TIE tokens to issue for the BTC deposits will be calculated according to the current exchange rate of this cryptocurrency in Ethereum. After the campaign is completed and the token is traded on the relevant cryptocurrency exchange, its value will be determined by the market ratio of supply and demand.   Quote from: makemebeat on September 22, 2017, 02:16:39 PM What is the guarantee of the long-term work of this project?  The project invested a lot of resources, there is a development strategy, roadmap development, which is already being implemented. 20% of TIE-tokens remain with the team. And one of our goals is the growth of these TIE-tokens.

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Access to the platform is provided via a mobile client (Android, iOS) as well as desktop versions for the platform for all main operating systems (Windows, MacOS, and Linux).   Quote from: kenel on September 21, 2017, 01:24:08 PM This network will be moderated? This is very important, you must not allow chaos!   Ties.Network aims to create the atmosphere of trust and security that is so highly valued in crypto community. It is decentralised, distributed and belongs to the users. It is moderated by the users hired by the platform to ensure fraud prevention and illegal trade. System moderators act as per-diem arbitrators and use the contract terms to settle disputes, when and if necessary.  Quote from: Itcher on September 21, 2017, 01:41:46 PM Can I become a moderator of your network and what moderators roles are in Ties?   Of course you can try! There are the following moderator roles in TIES: Content moderator (individuals given special authority to enforce the rules on the platform and to regulate, delete, or ban content) Budget defense super-moderator (this moderator investigates collusion between nodes and users, banning nodes and users if necessary) Judges (settling disputes between users)  Quote from: florianuhlemann on September 21, 2017, 01:52:32 PM what to do if I need to stay anonymous?   An address is linked with a user when they publish their name and Ties.Network address. Users can avoid this by using a new, unused address for every incoming transaction.

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: http://Ties.Network  project - decentralized platform, the database with multifunctional use.  Ties.Network is based on TIES DB – a public, decentralized, and distributed noSQL database that allows to store huge amounts of dynamic data, and search within the content of the files. http://Ties.Network  is the analogy of LinkedIn for the crypto-community. It is a decentralized platform for traders, investors, developers, consultants and enthusiasts to hire and recruit partners, employees and volunteers, sell their products or services, enter into joint deals based on smart contracts, promote themselves, and finance their projects, among other items. People can work individually or as teams to accomplish their objectives.  More information about the project, and read Whitepaper you can on our website: http://ties.network  Quote from: Itcher on September 20, 2017, 10:04:54 PM Hello! Can i take any discount during token-sale campaign? Ties.Network Token Genereation Event offers special discounts depending on how early an investor has decided to support the Token Generation Event. Discounts range from 20% for the first 10% of tokens sold step-ping down to zero discount for the last 10% of tokens available for the market. Currently, there are 140.000.000 tokens available, so discount steps down with each 14.000.000 tokens sold. More here(page 5): https://cdn.ties.network/business-overview-en.pdf Quote from: hometester on September 20, 2017, 10:24:09 PM An interesting and optimistic project! How much is your cap? The hard cap is $33.6 million Our Token Generation Event starts on 21 september! Token distribution is starting in less than 2 weeks! Visit our website and sign up for our mailing list so that you don't miss it: https://ties.network Quote from: goodluck0319 on September 20, 2017, 10:46:19 PM Will the ties network have the communities, messenger and  other social networking features? We will try to take the best of all social networks and develop a comfortable product for the crypto-community. We are working on the Ties.Network project and already have prototypes. Our prototype is ready! You can download it on the main page of our official website. Check it out! https://ties.network/

Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: In Ties.Network, a chat using end-to-end encryption, such as BitMessage, will be implemented, to connect network users.  Quote from: TomKoinify on September 20, 2017, 11:24:11 PM what's good about TIES.network, why would people want to use it? Ties.Network is a business platform for the crypto community that allows you to quickly find business partners in crypto communities around the world with proven skills and competencies, and quickly make secure business transactions with the TIE crypto currency that is the basis of the platform. The Ties.Network platform, as well as the TiesDB (database), work on the TIE token, which is made for the convenience of our users and partners. It allows you to get all the services on one platform, paying them with one cryptocurrency, without the need to purchase and maintain various cryptos. At the same time, our solution is based on Ethereum, and therefore, the user will see in their wallet TIE, ETH and any other Ethereum based tokens that they bought, and will be able to produce any of the cryptos available to other platform users, as well as counterparties outside platform.   Quote from: mika1977 on September 20, 2017, 11:45:54 PM Hey! Is there any presale ? We don't have any whitelists and dont use presale. You can buy our tokens by taking part in Ties.Network Token Sale on September 21. Want to know more about our token-sale? Here you can find a lot of information:  https://ties.network/TGE-details And we have bonus scale for early buyers. Read more here(page5): Business Overview

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Now the Ties.Network team is preparing for the Token Genereation Event . It will take place on 21st of September and we keep focusing.  Here you can find more details: Token Sale details White Paper Business Overview   Quote from: florianuhlemann on September 21, 2017, 11:00:26 AM explain to me what is Tise.Network? is this another social network?  Ties.Network is an Ethereum-based business platform for the crypto community that allows one to quickly find professionals with proven skills worldwide. Users can strike deals utilizing smart contracts. One can create projects and teams, and conduct ICO’s due diligence with the help of an expert community.  Ties.Network is based on the public, decentralized, distributed NoSQL database, Ties.DB, that can be used by other projects. Ties.DB is Byzantine fault tolerant.  Quote from: getwork on September 21, 2017, 11:21:14 AM how can I promote my Business using Ties.Network? I have friends from Spain and Norway and they want to go out on the world markets!   A new business networking tool for the crypto-community, blockchain-based Ties.Network presents a professional networking platform that allows developers, consultants, entrepreneurs, and other professionals and corporations to find business partners, offer services, close deals, hire staff members, advertise services, and finance projects. Ties.Network combines the versatility of an industry-grade networking platform with advanced technology that provides high security and anonymity in business transactions. It can be utilized for public and private sectors and across industries to serve a wide range of potential customers and fields of implementation.  learn more in our blog: Ties.Network, a Smart and Decentralized Business Network that will change the way business is done today  Also join in our telegram channel: JOIN   Quote from: goodluck0319 on September 21, 2017, 11:29:11 AM Hello! I'm don't understand how can i start a new project in network ?    Any user can upload their project, organization details or profile on Ties.Network. The platform can be used to recruit members of the project team, to create a project wallet to pay team members, or to receive donations. Additionally, users can negotiate terms of the deal and share documents and photos to members  of the community.

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Your profile is a page that describes your career history, education, and other related content that you may want to publish. The user information includes: Name and surname Date of birth Contact information Current occupation or position A professional headshot Skills and experiences Business ads Keywords to be included in the search A rating and review form (which can be filled out by other users based on previous business transactions), as well as advertising form for their goods and services. Chat – This refers to communication between the users in real-time. All messaging history in the chats is stored client-side (mobile/desktop) and encrypted using an end-to-end protocol. The content of the chats (photos, videos, files) is also encrypted and stored in the same manner. Quote from: florianuhlemann on September 20, 2017, 07:54:44 PM Supply/Demand. More people want to buy than sell. after each ICO we see that scenario. We completely understand why people do it, and we also understand why people see ICOs as risky - they don't understand the product and don't believe in it. Quote from: getwork on September 20, 2017, 08:14:09 PM If you're not planning to launch your platform until the fourth quarter of 2018, what incentive is there for me to invest in this now? What gives your tokens value? Because today token is cheap. As we proceed to Q4 2018 it will grow. Consider Ethereum. It took two years to launch it. And Ether has grown 300 times. We are aimed at real product that is why we plan real roadmap. But real product increases the chances to multiply token value.  Quote from: goodluck0319 on September 20, 2017, 08:25:12 PM What is the pric.e? Are sharp downturns expected?  The price will be 0.24 USD / TIE and actual rate to ETH will be determined immediately before the Token Sale. Token distribution is starting in less than 2 weeks! Visit our website and sign up for our mailing list so that you don't miss it: https://ties.network  After the campaign is completed and the token is traded on the exchange, its value will be determined by the market ratio of supply and demand. The cost of the TIE token in BTC and ETH will vary depending on the market rate of these currencies.

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Ties.Network platform does not take a commission from money received from goods or services, nor does it take a share of any project. Instead, Ties.Network imposes taxes and commissions on services to repay moderators and maintain its service.  Quote from: florianuhlemann on September 20, 2017, 11:41:41 AM Have you guys followed SEC regulation by filing the proper paperwork (or are you planning to be non-US?) So far I haven't found a single ICO that has. Also do you feel that China will fully investigate and approve your case before the ICO begins? As mentioned in the first half of my post most ICOs don't really go anywhere which is why they are working towards regulating them.  They didnt ban actually. US requires SEC filing where token falls under definition of security, and China takes time to investigate ICO cases. Both facts can be no way construed as ICO prohibition. We're not required to file with SEC since TIE token is merely utility one (according to famous Howey test). And the contemplated TGE will be non-us. That will be explicitly set forth in the TGE docs.   Quote from: hometester on September 20, 2017, 11:52:03 AM hi! how can I buy tokens?   Hello! You can buy our tokens by taking part in Ties.Network Token Sale on September 21. Want to know more about our token-sale? Here you can find a lot of information: Token Genereation Event    Quote from: goodluck0319 on September 20, 2017, 12:14:10 PM Eth only ? NO BTC?  All the necessary information you can find on our special page: https://ties.network/tge-details

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Users can search profiles of wanted employers, services, organizations, individuals, and the like. The search results are presented as a list with filters (e.g., individuals, projects, connections, ratings).  Quote from: TomKoinify on September 20, 2017, 06:42:56 PM Those who participate will obtain some shares and/or dividends to provid capital for a startup?  No, this is not an offering of shares or dividends. The ICO is a launch of the Tie, a utility coin for the Ties Network platform. The ICO allows interested parties to purchase the TIE coin at a discounted rate in advance of the full launch of the Ties Network platform, which allows you to search for business partners in crypto community, create projects and make business deals.  A utility coin refers to the fact that TIE is actually used for more than just speculation on the crypto exchanges but has a value that can be used for other purposes in the future such as mutual payments within the platform to business partners, who are also the members, and financing projects created on the platform.  Quote from: Kracko on September 20, 2017, 06:52:47 PM why are you doing 1 ico for 2 projects? Because Ties.DB is required to build Ties.Network. We'd like to use existing solution for data storage but there were no any. So we are pioneers to bring Ties.DB to decentralized world. Quote from: mika1977 on September 20, 2017, 07:03:23 PM what difference between ties.Network and Ties.DB? We have two projects. First of them is business network - with integrated deals on smart contracts and reputation system based on deals. With this platform you can quickly find a skilled professional and strike a deal at once and pay with cryptocurrency. The second - is Ties.DB. It is a completely decentralized database with ability to store structured data and search through it. Ties.DB is aimed at all the decentralized projects, not only Ties.Network.

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: We are working on the Ties.Network project and already have prototypes! Quote from: florianuhlemann on September 19, 2017, 10:49:01 PM Hello!Is Ties LinkedIn like project? http://Ties.Network  project - decentralized platform, the database with multifunctional use.  Ties.Network is based on TIES DB – a public, decentralized, and distributed noSQL database that allows to store huge amounts of dynamic data, and search within the content of the files. http://Ties.Network  is the analogy of LinkedIn for the crypto-community. It is a decentralized platform for traders, investors, developers, consultants and enthusiasts to hire and recruit partners, employees and volunteers, sell their products or services, enter into joint deals based on smart contracts, promote themselves, and finance their projects, among other items. People can work individually or as teams to accomplish their objectives.  More information about the project, and read Whitepaper you can on our website: http://ties.network  Quote from: getwork on September 19, 2017, 11:05:46 PM No github to check whats going on about this project and decide if its legit ? Hi, our github is here: https://github.com/tiesnetwork you can also find the link to our github on all threads. Please read our White Paperalso to get a full understanding about what Ties.Network is about. Thanks!  Quote from: goodluck0319 on September 19, 2017, 11:13:50 PM Where can I find the YouTube channel and slack? Youtube: Ties.Network @Youtube Slack: Ties.Network SLACK Stay tuned to our social channels!

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Access to the platform is provided via a mobile client (Android, iOS) as well as desktop versions for the platform for all main operating systems (Windows, MacOS, and Linux).  Quote from: Itcher on September 19, 2017, 05:33:34 PM This network will be moderated? This is very important, you must not allow chaos! Ties.Network aims to create the atmosphere of trust and security that is so highly valued in crypto community. It is decentralised, distributed and belongs to the users. It is moderated by the users hired by the platform to ensure fraud prevention and illegal trade. System moderators act as per-diem arbitrators and use the contract terms to settle disputes, when and if necessary. Quote from: hometester on September 19, 2017, 05:54:13 PM Can I become a moderator of your network and what moderators roles are in Ties? Of course you can try! There are the following moderator roles in TIES: Content moderator (individuals given special authority to enforce the rules on the platform and to regulate, delete, or ban content) Budget defense super-moderator (this moderator investigates collusion between nodes and users, banning nodes and users if necessary) Judges (settling disputes between users) Quote from: getwork on September 19, 2017, 06:04:18 PM what to do if I need to stay anonymous? An address is linked with a user when they publish their name and Ties.Network address. Users can avoid this by using a new, unused address for every incoming transaction.

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: This is official Ties.Network team announcement  We have disabled our slack channeldue to security reasons. There have been several phishing attacks on our channel. Please note that we do not publish any address contract chats or private messages. The only place where we published this is our official web site.

Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Thank you for the trust!  Also join in our telegram channel: JOIN  Quote from: Itcher on September 19, 2017, 08:20:48 PM This looks impressive.  However, there is a network for Blockchain developers and Blockchain enthusiasts. Our main feature is a business platform for the crypto community. Getting into Ties.Netvork - you immediately get into a special atmosphere of crypto-community. Stay tuned to our social channels!  Quote from: florianuhlemann on September 19, 2017, 08:33:10 PM what if i want to use TOR/VPN with your network? are there any restrictions? Yes, It wiil work thruogth the browser, like TOR, for example. Users who want anonymity can benefit from additional connectivity to the nodes where some of the nodes are published as TOR Hidden Service and access to them is only achieved through TOR.  Quote from: goodluck0319 on September 19, 2017, 09:04:35 PM Is it possible to participate in the ICO without the address Ethereums? No, because our token is a token issued on Ethereum blockchain, so you need to have an Ethereum address to receive and store your ICO tokens. You can use any Ethereum wallet: Ethereum wallet, Mist, Parity, MyEtherWallet.com, Jaxx or any other wallet where you have access to the wallet private keys. Do not deposit Ethereum to the TGE using the cryptocurrency exchange account!!! You don't own your cryptoexchange ETH address private key, so will not be able to access your TGE tokens!

Here you can find more details: Token Sale details White Paper Business Overview  Quote from: florianuhlemann on September 19, 2017, 02:52:05 PM explain to me what is Tise.Network? is this another social network?   Ties.Network is an Ethereum-based business platform for the crypto community that allows one to quickly find professionals with proven skills worldwide. Users can strike deals utilizing smart contracts. One can create projects and teams, and conduct ICO’s due diligence with the help of an expert community.  Ties.Network is based on the public, decentralized, distributed NoSQL database, Ties.DB, that can be used by other projects. Ties.DB is Byzantine fault tolerant.  Quote from: getwork on September 19, 2017, 03:13:08 PM how can I promote my Business using Ties.Network? I have friends from Spain and Norway and they want to go out on the world markets!    A new business networking tool for the crypto-community, blockchain-based Ties.Network presents a professional networking platform that allows developers, consultants, entrepreneurs, and other professionals and corporations to find business partners, offer services, close deals, hire staff members, advertise services, and finance projects. Ties.Network combines the versatility of an industry-grade networking platform with advanced technology that provides high security and anonymity in business transactions. It can be utilized for public and private sectors and across industries to serve a wide range of potential customers and fields of implementation.  learn more in our blog: Ties.Network, a Smart and Decentralized Business Network that will change the way business is done today  Also join in our telegram channel: JOIN  Quote from: goodluck0319 on September 19, 2017, 03:24:38 PM Hello! I'm don't understand how can i start a new project in network ?    Any user can upload their project, organization details or profile on Ties.Network. The platform can be used to recruit members of the project team, to create a project wallet to pay team members, or to receive donations. Additionally, users can negotiate terms of the deal and share documents and photos to members  of the community.

Ties.Network is based on TIES DB – a public, decentralized, and distributed noSQL database that allows to store huge amounts of dynamic data, and search within the content of the files. http://Ties.Network  is the analogy of LinkedIn for the crypto-community. It is a decentralized platform for traders, investors, developers, consultants and enthusiasts to hire and recruit partners, employees and volunteers, sell their products or services, enter into joint deals based on smart contracts, promote themselves, and finance their projects, among other items. People can work individually or as teams to accomplish their objectives.  More information about the project, and read Whitepaper you can on our website: http://ties.network   Quote from: hometester on September 19, 2017, 12:12:05 PM Hello! Can i take any discount during token-sale campaign? Currently, there are 140.000.000 tokens available, so discount steps down with each 14.000.000 tokens sold. Quote from: TomKoinify on September 19, 2017, 01:38:30 PM what's good about TIES.network, why would people want to use it?  Ties.Network is a business platform for the crypto community that allows you to quickly find business partners in crypto communities around the world with proven skills and competencies, and quickly make secure business transactions with the TIE crypto currency that is the basis of the platform. The Ties.Network platform, as well as the TiesDB (database), work on the TIE token, which is made for the convenience of our users and partners. It allows you to get all the services on one platform, paying them with one cryptocurrency, without the need to purchase and maintain various cryptos. At the same time, our solution is based on Ethereum, and therefore, the user will see in their wallet TIE, ETH and any other Ethereum based tokens that they bought, and will be able to produce any of the cryptos available to other platform users, as well as counterparties outside platform. Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Ties.Network platform does not take a commission from money received from goods or services, nor does it take a share of any project. Instead, Ties.Network imposes taxes and commissions on services to repay moderators and maintain its service.  Quote from: makemebeat on September 19, 2017, 02:07:56 AM Have you guys followed SEC regulation by filing the proper paperwork (or are you planning to be non-US?) So far I haven't found a single ICO that has. Also do you feel that China will fully investigate and approve your case before the ICO begins? As mentioned in the first half of my post most ICOs don't really go anywhere which is why they are working towards regulating them. They didnt ban actually. US requires SEC filing where token falls under definition of security, and China takes time to investigate ICO cases. Both facts can be no way construed as ICO prohibition. We're not required to file with SEC since TIE token is merely utility one (according to famous Howey test). And the contemplated TGE will be non-us. That will be explicitly set forth in the TGE docs.  Quote from: Abitcoinfuture on September 19, 2017, 02:16:36 AM hi! how can I buy tokens?  Hello! You can buy our tokens by taking part in Ties.Network Token Sale on September 21. Want to know more about our token-sale? Here you can find a lot of information: Token Genereation Event  Quote from: Kracko on September 19, 2017, 02:40:25 AM Eth only ? NO BTC? All the necessary information you can find on our special page: https://ties.network/tge-details

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Users can search profiles of wanted employers, services, organizations, individuals, and the like. The search results are presented as a list with filters (e.g., individuals, projects, connections, ratings).  Quote from: atariguy on September 19, 2017, 03:27:02 AM Those who participate will obtain some shares and/or dividends to provid capital for a startup?  No, this is not an offering of shares or dividends. The ICO is a launch of the Tie, a utility coin for the Ties Network platform. The ICO allows interested parties to purchase the TIE coin at a discounted rate in advance of the full launch of the Ties Network platform, which allows you to search for business partners in crypto community, create projects and make business deals.  A utility coin refers to the fact that TIE is actually used for more than just speculation on the crypto exchanges but has a value that can be used for other purposes in the future such as mutual payments within the platform to business partners, who are also the members, and financing projects created on the platform.  Quote from: Itcher on September 19, 2017, 03:39:16 AM why are you doing 1 ico for 2 projects? Because Ties.DB is required to build Ties.Network. We'd like to use existing solution for data storage but there were no any. So we are pioneers to bring Ties.DB to decentralized world.  Quote from: florianuhlemann on September 19, 2017, 03:51:20 AM what difference between ties.Network and Ties.DB?  We have two projects. First of them is business network - with integrated deals on smart contracts and reputation system based on deals. With this platform you can quickly find a skilled professional and strike a deal at once and pay with cryptocurrency. The second - is Ties.DB. It is a completely decentralized database with ability to store structured data and search through it. Ties.DB is aimed at all the decentralized projects, not only Ties.Network.

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Your profile is a page that describes your career history, education, and other related content that you may want to publish. The user information includes: Name and surname Date of birth Contact information Current occupation or position A professional headshot Skills and experiences Business ads Keywords to be included in the search A rating and review form (which can be filled out by other users based on previous business transactions), as well as advertising form for their goods and services. Chat – This refers to communication between the users in real-time. All messaging history in the chats is stored client-side (mobile/desktop) and encrypted using an end-to-end protocol. The content of the chats (photos, videos, files) is also encrypted and stored in the same manner.  Quote from: strideynet on September 19, 2017, 04:31:29 AM Supply/Demand. More people want to buy than sell. after each ICO we see that scenario. We completely understand why people do it, and we also understand why people see ICOs as risky - they don't understand the product and don't believe in it.  Quote from: makemebeat on September 19, 2017, 04:48:18 AM If you're not planning to launch your platform until the fourth quarter of 2018, what incentive is there for me to invest in this now? What gives your tokens value? Because today token is cheap. As we proceed to Q4 2018 it will grow. Consider Ethereum. It took two years to launch it. And Ether has grown 300 times. We are aimed at real product that is why we plan real roadmap. But real product increases the chances to multiply token value.  Quote from: Abitcoinfuture on September 19, 2017, 05:00:24 AM What is the price? Are sharp downturns expected?    The price will be 0.24 USD / TIE and actual rate to ETH will be determined immediately before the Token Sale. Token distribution is starting in less than 2 weeks! Visit our website and sign up for our mailing list so that you don't miss it: https://ties.network    After the campaign is completed and the token is traded on the exchange, its value will be determined by the market ratio of supply and demand. The cost of the TIE token in BTC and ETH will vary depending on the market rate of these currencies.

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Thank you for the trust!  Also join in our telegram channel: JOIN Quote from: Abitcoinfuture on September 18, 2017, 09:18:02 PM This looks impressive. However, there is a network for Blockchain developers and Blockchain enthusiasts.  Our main feature is a business platform for the crypto community. Getting into Ties.Netvork - you immediately get into a special atmosphere of crypto-community. Stay tuned to our social channels! Quote from: TomKoinify on September 18, 2017, 09:28:25 PM what if i want to use TOR/VPN with your network? are there any restrictions? Yes, It wiil work thruogth the browser, like TOR, for example. Users who want anonymity can benefit from additional connectivity to the nodes where some of the nodes are published as TOR Hidden Service and access to them is only achieved through TOR. Quote from: kenel on September 18, 2017, 09:58:35 PM Is it possible to participate in the ICO without the address Ethereums? No, because our token is a token issued on Ethereum blockchain, so you need to have an Ethereum address to receive and store your ICO tokens. You can use any Ethereum wallet: Ethereum wallet, Mist, Parity, MyEtherWallet.com, Jaxx or any other wallet where you have access to the wallet private keys. Do not deposit Ethereum to the TGE using the cryptocurrency exchange account!!! You don't own your cryptoexchange ETH address private key, so will not be able to access your TGE tokens!

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Now the Ties.Network team is preparing for the Token Genereation Event . It will take place on 21st of September and we keep focusing.  Here you can find more details: Token Sale details White Paper Business Overview  Quote from: TomKoinify on September 18, 2017, 04:28:31 PM explain to me what is Tise.Network? is this another social network? Ties.Network is an Ethereum-based business platform for the crypto community that allows one to quickly find professionals with proven skills worldwide. Users can strike deals utilizing smart contracts. One can create projects and teams, and conduct ICO’s due diligence with the help of an expert community.  Ties.Network is based on the public, decentralized, distributed NoSQL database, Ties.DB, that can be used by other projects. Ties.DB is Byzantine fault tolerant.  Quote from: mika1977 on September 18, 2017, 04:50:44 PM how can I promote my Business using Ties.Network? I have friends from Spain and Norway and they want to go out on the world markets! A new business networking tool for the crypto-community, blockchain-based Ties.Network presents a professional networking platform that allows developers, consultants, entrepreneurs, and other professionals and corporations to find business partners, offer services, close deals, hire staff members, advertise services, and finance projects. Ties.Network combines the versatility of an industry-grade networking platform with advanced technology that provides high security and anonymity in business transactions. It can be utilized for public and private sectors and across industries to serve a wide range of potential customers and fields of implementation.  learn more in our blog: Ties.Network, a Smart and Decentralized Business Network that will change the way business is done today  Also join in our telegram channel: JOIN Quote from: kenel on September 18, 2017, 04:59:32 PM Hello! I'm don't understand how can i start a new project in network ? Any user can upload their project, organization details or profile on Ties.Network. The platform can be used to recruit members of the project team, to create a project wallet to pay team members, or to receive donations. Additionally, users can negotiate terms of the deal and share documents and photos to members  of the community.

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Access to the platform is provided via a mobile client (Android, iOS) as well as desktop versions for the platform for all main operating systems (Windows, MacOS, and Linux).  Quote from: Abitcoinfuture on September 18, 2017, 06:39:16 PM This network will be moderated? This is very important, you must not allow chaos! Ties.Network aims to create the atmosphere of trust and security that is so highly valued in crypto community. It is decentralised, distributed and belongs to the users. It is moderated by the users hired by the platform to ensure fraud prevention and illegal trade. System moderators act as per-diem arbitrators and use the contract terms to settle disputes, when and if necessary. Quote from: Kracko on September 18, 2017, 06:57:24 PM Can I become a moderator of your network and what moderators roles are in Ties? Of course you can try! There are the following moderator roles in TIES: Content moderator (individuals given special authority to enforce the rules on the platform and to regulate, delete, or ban content) Budget defense super-moderator (this moderator investigates collusion between nodes and users, banning nodes and users if necessary) Judges (settling disputes between users) Quote from: mika1977 on September 18, 2017, 07:06:17 PM what to do if I need to stay anonymous? An address is linked with a user when they publish their name and Ties.Network address. Users can avoid this by using a new, unused address for every incoming transaction.

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: http://Ties.Network  project - decentralized platform, the database with multifunctional use.  Ties.Network is based on TIES DB – a public, decentralized, and distributed noSQL database that allows to store huge amounts of dynamic data, and search within the content of the files. http://Ties.Network  is the analogy of LinkedIn for the crypto-community. It is a decentralized platform for traders, investors, developers, consultants and enthusiasts to hire and recruit partners, employees and volunteers, sell their products or services, enter into joint deals based on smart contracts, promote themselves, and finance their projects, among other items. People can work individually or as teams to accomplish their objectives.  More information about the project, and read Whitepaper you can on our website: http://ties.network  Quote from: chaolang on September 18, 2017, 12:56:10 PM Hello! Can i take any discount during token-sale campaign?   Ties.Network Token Genereation Event offers special discounts depending on how early an investor has decided to support the Token Generation Event. Discounts range from 20% for the first 10% of tokens sold step-ping down to zero discount for the last 10% of tokens available for the market. Currently, there are 140.000.000 tokens available, so discount steps down with each 14.000.000 tokens sold. More here(page 5): https://cdn.ties.network/business-overview-en.pdf  Quote from: Abitcoinfuture on September 18, 2017, 01:15:41 PM An interesting and optimistic project! How much is your cap?  The hard cap is $33.6 million Our Token Generation Event starts on 21 september! Token distribution is starting in less than 2 weeks! Visit our website and sign up for our mailing list so that you don't miss it: https://ties.network  Quote from: Kracko on September 18, 2017, 01:37:15 PM Will the ties network have the communities, messenger and  other social networking features?    We will try to take the best of all social networks and develop a comfortable product for the crypto-community. We are working on the Ties.Network project and already have prototypes. Read the following link in our Twitter account: https://twitter.com/tiesnetwork/status/902503781681782784

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: In Ties.Network, a chat using end-to-end encryption, such as BitMessage, will be implemented, to connect network users.   Quote from: atariguy on September 18, 2017, 02:18:35 PM what's good about TIES.network, why would people want to use it?   Ties.Network is a business platform for the crypto community that allows you to quickly find business partners in crypto communities around the world with proven skills and competencies, and quickly make secure business transactions with the TIE crypto currency that is the basis of the platform. The Ties.Network platform, as well as the TiesDB (database), work on the TIE token, which is made for the convenience of our users and partners. It allows you to get all the services on one platform, paying them with one cryptocurrency, without the need to purchase and maintain various cryptos. At the same time, our solution is based on Ethereum, and therefore, the user will see in their wallet TIE, ETH and any other Ethereum based tokens that they bought, and will be able to produce any of the cryptos available to other platform users, as well as counterparties outside platform.   Quote from: florianuhlemann on September 18, 2017, 02:40:00 PM Hey! Is there any presale ?   We don't have any whitelists and dont use presale. You can buy our tokens by taking part in Ties.Network Token Sale on September 21. Want to know more about our token-sale? Here you can find a lot of information:  https://ties.network/TGE-details And we have bonus scale for early buyers. Read more here(page5): Business Overview

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Users can search profiles of wanted employers, services, organizations, individuals, and the like. The search results are presented as a list with filters (e.g., individuals, projects, connections, ratings).  Quote from: getwork on September 17, 2017, 11:44:10 PM Those who participate will obtain some shares and/or dividends to provid capital for a startup? No, this is not an offering of shares or dividends. The ICO is a launch of the Tie, a utility coin for the Ties Network platform. The ICO allows interested parties to purchase the TIE coin at a discounted rate in advance of the full launch of the Ties Network platform, which allows you to search for business partners in crypto community, create projects and make business deals.  A utility coin refers to the fact that TIE is actually used for more than just speculation on the crypto exchanges but has a value that can be used for other purposes in the future such as mutual payments within the platform to business partners, who are also the members, and financing projects created on the platform.  Quote from: goodluck0319 on September 17, 2017, 11:55:10 PM why are you doing 1 ico for 2 projects? Because Ties.DB is required to build Ties.Network. We'd like to use existing solution for data storage but there were no any. So we are pioneers to bring Ties.DB to decentralized world.  Quote from: strideynet on September 18, 2017, 12:06:17 AM what difference between ties.Network and Ties.DB? We have two projects. First of them is business network - with integrated deals on smart contracts and reputation system based on deals. With this platform you can quickly find a skilled professional and strike a deal at once and pay with cryptocurrency. The second - is Ties.DB. It is a completely decentralized database with ability to store structured data and search through it. Ties.DB is aimed at all the decentralized projects, not only Ties.Network.

Author: kuverty
Title: [ANN] Ties.DB FIRST DECENTRALIZED PUBLIC SMART DATABASE
Body: Your profile is a page that describes your career history, education, and other related content that you may want to publish. The user information includes: Name and surname Date of birth Contact information Current occupation or position A professional headshot Skills and experiences Business ads Keywords to be included in the search A rating and review form (which can be filled out by other users based on previous business transactions), as well as advertising form for their goods and services. Chat – This refers to communication between the users in real-time. All messaging history in the chats is stored client-side (mobile/desktop) and encrypted using an end-to-end protocol. The content of the chats (photos, videos, files) is also encrypted and stored in the same manner.   Quote from: Abitcoinfuture on September 18, 2017, 10:37:39 AM Supply/Demand. More people want to buy than sell.  after each ICO we see that scenario. We completely understand why people do it, and we also understand why people see ICOs as risky - they don't understand the product and don't believe in it.   Quote from: Kracko on September 18, 2017, 10:59:33 AM If you're not planning to launch your platform until the fourth quarter of 2018, what incentive is there for me to invest in this now? What gives your tokens value?  Because today token is cheap. As we proceed to Q4 2018 it will grow. Consider Ethereum. It took two years to launch it. And Ether has grown 300 times. We are aimed at real product that is why we plan real roadmap. But real product increases the chances to multiply token value.   Quote from: kenel on September 18, 2017, 11:10:30 AM What is the pric.e? Are sharp downturns expected?   The price will be 0.24 USD / TIE and actual rate to ETH will be determined immediately before the Token Sale. Token distribution is starting in less than 2 weeks! Visit our website and sign up for our mailing list so that you don't miss it: https://ties.network  After the campaign is completed and the token is traded on the exchange, its value will be determined by the market ratio of supply and demand. The cost of the TIE token in BTC and ETH will vary depending on the market rate of these currencies.

You are welcome to join live support Telegram channel by clicking the below link: https://t.me/tiesnetwork  Quote from: Itcher on September 18, 2017, 11:42:03 AM Hi! Are Ties for mining?  In Ties.DB, you can receive tokens by providing equipment to the network. But the mining will begin at the end of 2018. It is not mining. It is the earning of tokens.   Quote from: florianuhlemann on September 18, 2017, 11:53:08 AM Could anybody please tell me what nationalities will participate in platform? Is current list of participants already known?    Ties.Network is an Ethereum-based business platform for the crypto community that allows one to quickly find professionals with proven skills worldwide. Our network will work worldwide. And as it's blockchain-based, it's not really attached to any particular place on Earth. However, there is a network for Blockchain developers and Blockchain enthusiasts. Our main feature is a business platform for the crypto community.
